T02D2584:107b-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i n'a ma aam ga'i ti gu hya b'anno po ka dzny'a na d'i pa n'a ma /
T02D2584:107b-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod
T02D2584:107b-4: pa'i gsang ba dang ldan pa'i sgrub ba'i thabs kyi
T02D2584:107b-5: 'grel pa ye shes gsal ba zhes bya ba /
T02D2584:107b-6: ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2584:107b-7: dpal ldan khyab bdag lnga yi dngos //
T02D2584:107b-8: ye shes sku la rab btud de //
T02D2584:107b-9: don dam zab mo'i nges don la //
T02D2584:107b-11: bdag pas blo dman don la gzung ba dang //
T02D2584:107b-12: nges don gsum gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa dang //
T02D2584:107b-13: bla ma'i gdams ngag ma thob rnal 'byor don ltos pa'i //
T02D2584:107b-14: gang zag rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2584:107b-16: rgyud las nges don btus te bshad //
T02D2584:107b-17: de la mdo'i don zhus shing slar gsungs pa'i thabs bstan pa dang /
T02D2584:107b-18: nyams su blang ba'i thabs bstan pa gnyis las /
T02D2584:107b-19: 'dir mdo'i don zhus shing slar gsungs pa'i tshul bstan pa bshad de /
T02D2584:107b-20: gsang sngags kyi lugs kyis thig le byang chub kyi sems gtan la dbab dgos te /
T02D2584:107b-21: de'i don ni gnas pa bzhi /
T02D2584:107b-23: nyams su myong ba'i thabs bzhi /
T02D2584:107b-24: de'i 'bras bu bzhi la yang dag pa'i don 'dus pas de bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2584:107b-25: thig le bcu drug mi shigs dbus //
T02D2584:107b-27: de ltar gnyis med kyi ye shes rtogs pa'i dus
T02D2584:107b-28: na tshig dang yi ge'i sgros pa'i mtha' dang bral
T02D2584:107b-29: bas / yan lag med cing rtsis las 'das //
T02D2584:107b-31: de ltar rtog pa dang nyon mongs pa drug spyang
T02D2584:107b-32: ba'i gnyen por dbugs dbyung drug gi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2584:107b-34: de yang mi rtog pa'i sems kyis zin par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2584:107b-35: de nyid ldan zhing yid rtog 'das //
T02D2584:107b-37: de lta bu'i don ni blo dang ldan pa kun
T02D2584:107b-38: gyis yang da ga pa'i gnas su 'gro ba'i lam
T02D2584:107b-40: nges 'byung kun gyi lam gang yin //
T02D2584:107b-42: don gsum dbyer med du rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2584:107b-43: don gsum the tshom med pa'i blos //
T02D2584:108a-2: snang ba'i chos thams cad skye med kyi don rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2584:108a-3: lus kyi mtha' ni nges rtogs bya //
T02D2584:108a-5: de lta bu'i don la gnas na phyin ci ma log pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2584:108a-6: byang chub bla na med pa'o //
T02D2584:108a-8: de'i ngang la gsang sngags kyi don gyis 'gro ba'i blo sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2584:108a-9: gsang sngags don kun skyed pa po //
T02D2584:108a-11: de'i dang las sku rnam pa gnyis kyis 'gro ba'i don byed pa bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:108a-12: longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi mchog / sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba /
T02D2584:108a-14: de lta bu ni lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod cing brjod pa'i gnas yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2584:108a-17: 'khor gyi gtso bos ston pa la mchod bstod byas nas 'gro ba'i don zhus pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2584:108a-18: byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul ldan //
T02D2584:108a-19: lag na rdo rje mthu bo ches //
T02D2584:108a-20: nyid la snyan pa'i tshig dag gis //
T02D2584:108a-21: bstod nas mtshan gyi rim pa zhus //
T02D2584:108a-23: ston pas 'gro ba'i don du bsnyen pa bya ba'i rim pa dang /
T02D2584:108a-24: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i rim pa dang /
T02D2584:108a-25: de la tshogs bsag pa dang /
T02D2584:108a-26: spyin sreg bya ba'i rim pa dang /
T02D2584:108a-27: na ba la phan gdags pa'i rim pa dang /
T02D2584:108a-28: shi ba la phan gdags pa'i rim pa dang /
T02D2584:108a-29: lus kyi rtsa gnas kyi 'khor lo bstan pa'i rim pa dang /
T02D2584:108a-30: slob ma dbang bskur ba'i rim pa dang /
T02D2584:108a-31: dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol ba'i rim pa dang /
T02D2584:108a-32: bla ma la yon dbul pa'i rim pa dang bcu gsungs pas na /
T02D2584:108a-33: blo zhan don du rim pas gsungs //
T02D2584:108a-35: de'i nyams su blang ba'i thabs la gnyis te /
T02D2584:108a-36: bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa gnyis so //
T02D2584:108a-37: sngon la bsnyen pa ston te /
T02D2584:108a-38: don dang ldan pa'i slob dpon rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:108a-39: de la rdo rje 'chang chen pos //
T02D2584:108a-40: slob dpon cha lugs gnas byas te //
T02D2584:108a-42: de nas sgrub pa pos nyams dang gar 'thad du gnas par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2584:108a-43: bsam gtan dang ni rjes mthun pa'i //
T02D2584:108a-44: zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshig rkang lnga gsungs so //
T02D2584:108b-0: @108b la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni 'og padma 'dab brgyad du 'dug la /
T02D2584:108b-1: steng 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad du 'dug pa /
T02D2584:108b-2: me tog gi snam bu lang ling du chags pa /
T02D2584:108b-5: lcug phran gyi tshal yod pa /
T02D2584:108b-6: bkra shis kyi phya sna tshogs sgra sgrogs pa de 'dra'i gnas su bsnyen pa bya ste /
T02D2584:108b-8: bla ma'i bka' bzhin byed pa /
T02D2584:108b-9: dam tshig la gnas pa bya ba'i las la ma
T02D2584:108b-10: rmongs pa'i brtse ba'i gro gas dang 'grogs par bstan
T02D2584:108b-11: pa'i phyir / grogs bzad btsal la bsnyen pa brtsam //
T02D2584:108b-13: de nas don dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa des
T02D2584:108b-14: bde ba'i stan nang tshangs can 'bol ba la rdo
T02D2584:108b-15: rje'i skyil mo krung ngam ji ltar bde ba'i stan
T02D2584:108b-16: la 'dug ste / kha bras kyi tshod bzung /
T02D2584:108b-19: sems khog glod de sgom pa brtan pa'i phyir /
T02D2584:108b-20: bde ba'i stan la 'dug byas te //
T02D2584:108b-22: de nas rnam rtog gi bgegs bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2584:108b-23: bdag dang sa gzhi yongs bsrung zhing //
T02D2584:108b-24: ra ba dra bas mtshams bcad dang //
T02D2584:108b-25: phyogs dang steng 'og bcing sogs pa //
T02D2584:108b-26: rab tu 'bad de bsgom par bya //
T02D2584:108b-28: de'i don ni mgon po kun snang gi rgyud las 'di skad du /
T02D2584:108b-29: kye ma lha yi bu rnams dang //
T02D2584:108b-30: gzhon nu rnams ni tsho 'dod dang //
T02D2584:108b-31: phyi rol rgol ba tshar gcod dang //
T02D2584:108b-32: rnam rtog bgegs rnams bsrung 'dod na //
T02D2584:108b-33: dang por stong pa chen por bsgom //
T02D2584:108b-34: de yi dang las rang gi dngos //
T02D2584:108b-35: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag por bsam //
T02D2584:108b-36: lce la zla ba rdo rje ni //
T02D2584:108b-37: rtse lnga par ni rnam bsams la //
T02D2584:108b-38: badzra dzi hva zhes brjod de /
T02D2584:108b-39: rdo rje'i lce ru rnam par bsam //
T02D2584:108b-40: sngags zlos nus pa'i mthu dang ldan //
T02D2584:108b-41: lag pa gnyis su aa dang h'um //
T02D2584:108b-42: gong ma'i go rims don dang ldan //
T02D2584:108b-43: badzra ha ta zhes brjod de //
T02D2584:108b-44: rdo rje rtse lnga lta bur bsam //
T02D2584:108b-45: phyag rgya nus pa'i mthu dang ldan //
T02D2584:108b-46: de nas bdag nyid h'um las ni //
T02D2584:108b-47: gri hna badzra sa ma ya bam h'um /
T02D2584:108b-48: zhes pa'i sngags ni brjod nas kyang //
T02D2584:108b-49: rdo rje ti r'inti ri bcing //
T02D2584:108b-50: khro bo chen po me ltar rab tu 'bar ba char sprin gyi mdog can //
T02D2584:108b-51: 'od zer gyi phreng bas kun du 'khrug pa /
T02D2584:109a-1: che ba la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa /
T02D2584:109a-2: phyag g-yas pa rnams na rdo rje dang /
T02D2584:109a-6: phyag g-yon pa rnams na dril bu dang /
T02D2584:109a-9: kha tvam ga la btags pa'i ba dan sna tshogs bsnams pa /
T02D2584:109a-10: me ser skya 'bar ba lta bu'i skra'i tshogs shin tu 'jigs su rung ba /
T02D2584:109a-11: sbrul chen pos gdu bu dang dbu rgyan dang /
T02D2584:109a-12: ska rags dang zhabs gdub dang /
T02D2584:109a-16: sgyu 'phrul chen po'i 'khor lo dgod pa la mkhas pa /
T02D2584:109a-17: g-yon brkyang bas khyab pa 'jug dang chung mar bcas pa gnon pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2584:109a-18: de nas skyil krung phyed 'dug la //
T02D2584:109a-19: rdo rje bsdams pas nang bcings te //
T02D2584:109a-20: mthe bong gnyis ni gzhi bas byas la //
T02D2584:109a-21: bsgreng ba'i sor mo'i steng nas dgab //
T02D2584:109a-22: ti r'i nti ri'i phyag rgya ste //
T02D2584:109a-23: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'a rka hum aa bhi shi nytsa m'am //
T02D2584:109a-24: gsang sngags dam pa brjod nas ni //
T02D2584:109a-25: spyi bo nas brtsams phyogs bzhi yi //
T02D2584:109a-26: rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur blang //
T02D2584:109a-27: aom tum zhes pa'i yi ge gnyis //
T02D2584:109a-28: go cha dam pa bgos nas ni //
T02D2584:109a-29: mthar ni mnyam pa'i thal mo dang /
T02D2584:109a-30: badzra tu shya ho: zhes brjod //
T02D2584:109a-31: lus kyi cha lugs mnyam par bya //
T02D2584:109a-32: de nyid las ni ma g-yos par //
T02D2584:109a-33: g-yon pa'i khu tshur snying gar bzhag / g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur ni //
T02D2584:109a-34: lan gsum dag tu gsor byas la //
T02D2584:109a-35: bgegs rnams thams cad bsnun par bya //
T02D2584:109a-36: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'a rka h'um /
T02D2584:109a-37: de nas sems kyi chos 'phrul gyi //
T02D2584:109a-38: skad cig re la ting 'dzin te //
T02D2584:109a-39: bsgyar te las rnams rim par bya //
T02D2584:109a-40: bdag nyid khro bo rdo rje me //
T02D2584:109a-41: g-yas ba rdo rje med dpal g-yon sdig mdzub //
T02D2584:109a-43: de yi cho 'phul las byung ba'i //
T02D2584:109a-44: rdo rje bsdams pa nang bcings te /
T02D2584:109a-45: sor mo nang du 'bar bar bya //
T02D2584:109a-46: bthe [*mthe?] bong rdo rjer bsgreng ba ni //
T02D2584:109a-47: rdo rje me yi phyag rgya ste //
T02D2584:109a-48: bgegs rnams thams cad bsregs par bsam //
T02D2584:109a-49: aom badzra dzva la aa na la ha na da
T02D2584:109a-50: ha pa tsa ma th'a bha nydza ra na h'um
T02D2584:109a-51: phat / rdo rje bsdams pa bcings byas te /
T02D2584:109a-52: mthe bong gnyis ni rab tu brkyang //
T02D2584:109a-53: snyoms la steng du bzhag pa ni //
T02D2584:109a-54: rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya ste //
T02D2584:109a-55: bgegs rnams thams cad bcing bar bya //
T02D2584:109b-0: badzra ni tri bandha sarba @109b bighn'am /
T02D2584:109b-1: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la //
T02D2584:109b-2: mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin bskor te //
T02D2584:109b-3: mgo yi steng du mdzub mo gnyis //
T02D2584:109b-4: lcags kyu'i tshul du bzhag pa ni //
T02D2584:109b-5: rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgya ste //
T02D2584:109b-6: aom hu lu hu lu h'um phat /
T02D2584:109b-7: gsang sngags dam pa brjod pa yis //
T02D2584:109b-8: sku mdog dkar po kho bo ni //
T02D2584:109b-9: g-yas pa rdo rje g-yon sdigs mdzub //
T02D2584:109b-10: dpag tu med pas steng phyogs gtams //
T02D2584:109b-11: rdo rje thal mo brkyang byas te /
T02D2584:109b-12: mthe bong gnyis brkyang mdzub mo gnyis //
T02D2584:109b-13: mche ba lta bur byas pa ni //
T02D2584:109b-14: rdo rje gnod sbyin phyag rgya ste //
T02D2584:109b-16: gsang sngags dam pa brjod pa yis //
T02D2584:109b-17: sku mdog sngon po khro bo ni //
T02D2584:109b-18: mche pa thogs pa dpag tu med //
T02D2584:109b-19: de nyid du ni rnam par gtams //
T02D2584:109b-20: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02D2584:109b-21: mthe chung lu gu rgyud du sprel //
T02D2584:109b-22: mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse sbyar te //
T02D2584:109b-23: bzlog nas spyi bor gzhag pa ni //
T02D2584:109b-24: rdo rje gtsug tor phyag rgya ste //
T02D2584:109b-26: gsang sngags dam pa brjod pa yis //
T02D2584:109b-27: sku mdog dmar po khro bo ni //
T02D2584:109b-28: gtsug tor dang ni sdigs mdzub bsnams //
T02D2584:109b-29: dpag tu med pas shar phyogs gtams //
T02D2584:109b-30: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02D2584:109b-31: mkhrig ma gnyis ni mdud byas pa //
T02D2584:109b-32: rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2584:109b-33: aom h'um badzra p'a sha hr'i:/
T02D2584:109b-34: gsangs sngags dam pa brjod pa yis //
T02D2584:109b-35: sku mdog ser po khro bo ni //
T02D2584:109b-36: zhags pa dang ni sdigs mdzub bsnams //
T02D2584:109b-37: dpag tu med pas de nyid gtams //
T02D2584:109b-38: lag pa rdo rje bsdams pa las //
T02D2584:109b-39: mthe bong gnyis ni sems dpa' yi //
T02D2584:109b-40: skyil mo krung du bcas pa las //
T02D2584:109b-41: mdzub mo gnyis ni mnyam par gzhi bas //
T02D2584:109b-42: phye la mthe chung gnyis po ni //
T02D2584:109b-43: ba dan lta bur byas pa ni //
T02D2584:109b-44: rdo rje ba dan phyag rgya ste //
T02D2584:109b-45: aom badzra pa tam gi pa tam ki ni ra ta /
T02D2584:109b-46: gsangs sngags dam pa brjod pa yis //
T02D2584:109b-47: sku mdog dmar po kho bo ni //
T02D2584:109b-48: ba dan dang ni sdigs mdzub bsnams //
T02D2584:109b-49: nub kyi phyogs su rnam par gtams //
T02D2584:109b-50: rdo rje gnod sbyin phyag rgya nyid //
T02D2584:109b-51: kha ru rnam par bstan pa ni //
T02D2584:109b-52: rdo rje dus kyi phyag rgya ste //
T02D2584:109b-53: hr'i: badzra k'a li ru ta ma ta /
T02D2584:109b-54: gsang sngags dam pa brjod pa yis //
T02D2584:109b-55: sku mdog nag po khro bo ni //
T02D2584:109b-56: rdo rje dang ni sdigs mdzub bsnams //
T02D2584:109b-57: byang gi phyogs su rnam par gtams //
T02D2584:109b-58: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ni //
T02D2584:110a-2: rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya ste //
T02D2584:110a-3: aom badzra gi sha re ru ta ma ta //
T02D2584:110a-4: gsang sngags dam pa brjod pa yis //
T02D2584:110a-5: sgu mdog sngon po khro bo ni //
T02D2584:110a-6: rdo rje dang ni sdigs mdzub bsnams //
T02D2584:110a-7: lho yi phyogs su rnam bar gtams //
T02D2584:110a-8: rdo rje bsdams pas steng bzhag / aom badzra dri bho me bha bar ksha sarba sv'a t'a /
T02D2584:110a-9: gsang sngags dam pa brjod pa yis //
T02D2584:110a-10: sku mdog smug po khro bo ni //
T02D2584:110a-11: tho ba dang ni sdigs mdzub bsnams //
T02D2584:110a-12: 'og gi phyogs su rnam pa'i gtams //
T02D2584:110a-13: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la //
T02D2584:110a-14: ma khrig ma gnyis bsnol mthe chung gnyis //
T02D2584:110a-15: lcags kyu'i tshul du sprel byas la /
T02D2584:110a-16: mdzub mo'i sdigs mdzub gnyis bsgreng ba //
T02D2584:110a-17: rdo rje h'um mdzad phyag rgya ste //
T02D2584:110a-20: grihna pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um /
T02D2584:110a-22: bha ga b'a na bidy'a r'a dza h'um phat /
T02D2584:110a-23: gsang sngags dam pa brjod pa yis //
T02D2584:110a-24: nang du h'um mdzad ra bar gyur //
T02D2584:110a-25: de nyid las ni mdzub mo dang /
T02D2584:110a-26: gung mo gnyis ni rdo rjer byas //
T02D2584:110a-27: rdo rje las kyis phyag rgya ste //
T02D2584:110a-29: gsang sngags dam pa brjod pa yis //
T02D2584:110a-30: phyi rol las kyi ra bar gyur //
T02D2584:110a-31: lag nyis rdo rje bsdams pa dang /
T02D2584:110a-33: phyi rol rdo rje dra bar bsam //
T02D2584:110a-35: lha yi rdzu 'phrul dag kyang rdugs //
T02D2584:110a-36: tshangs dang brgya byin stobs che ba //
T02D2584:110a-37: mnan te shar dang steng du bcings //
T02D2584:110a-38: don dam gsum gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2584:110a-39: phyogs bcu thams cad bcing bar 'gyur //
T02D2584:110a-41: de nas sa phyogs de'i lha dang klu la sogs
T02D2584:110a-42: pa thams cad zhi zhing mnyes par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2584:110a-43: // de nas shin tu brtser ldan pas //
T02D2584:110a-44: sbyin sreg gis ni mnyes par bya //
T02D2584:110a-46: bdag nyid dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi nga rgyal dang
T02D2584:110a-47: ldan pas sems can thams cad la brtse ba dang
T02D2584:110a-48: ldan par bya zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2584:110a-49: des 'og nas gsungs pa'i don rnams kyis sbyin pa'i ni lha klu la'o //
T02D2584:110a-50: sreg pa ni sa phyogs ki skyon no //
T02D2584:110a-51: mnyes pa ni dkyil 'khor kyi lha'o //
T02D2584:110a-53: tshogs bsogs pa'i lan lag go //
T02D2584:110a-54: de ltar bgegs bsrungs phyogs kyi skyon zhi bar byas
T02D2584:110a-55: nas gzod rten gyi dkyil 'khor sprul par bstan pa'i
T02D2584:110a-56: phyir // de nas bsnyen pa rab 'bad de //
T02D2584:110b-1: dgyes pa bskyed phyir 'khor lo ni //
T02D2584:110b-3: dgyes pa bskyed pa ni bde bar gshegs pa'o //
T02D2584:110b-4: 'khor lo ni sbrul tshogs dku'i lha tsho'o //
T02D2584:110b-6: nam mkhar bsgom par bya ba yin //
T02D2584:110b-9: mkha' la 'dus pa'i 'khor lo dang bcas pa zhes pa ste sprul lo //
T02D2584:110b-11: lag gi 'du byed bsgom cing bya //
T02D2584:110b-12: 'bru lnga gnas pa'i sor mo la //
T02D2584:110b-14: lag gi 'du byed ni phag rgya'o //
T02D2584:110b-16: 'bru lnga ldan pa ni gung mo la aom //
T02D2584:110b-20: mthe chung la aa: bsam par bya'o //
T02D2584:110b-21: mdzub mo'i mthe chung mdud byas la //
T02D2584:110b-22: zhes pa ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas ste //
T02D2584:110b-23: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la //
T02D2584:110b-24: mdzub mo mthe chung lu gu rgyud //
T02D2584:110b-26: dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub byed yin //

T02D2584:110b-33: drug ni dbugs dbyung drug go //

T02D2584:110b-37: aom manydzu shr'i badzra tsa kra h'um /

T02D2584:110b-40: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo gang yin pa'i dbu rgyan du bla ma bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2584:110b-41: mnyam par shin tu bstod par bya //
T02D2584:110b-42: zhes pa ni mnyam pa ni bla ma dang po /
T02D2584:110b-43: shin tu bstod pa ni 'og nas 'byung pa'i 'dud la sogs pa'o //
T02D2584:110b-44: ae ma ni nam mkhar sprul pa'i lha tshogs la ngo mtshar che ba'o //
T02D2584:110b-45: ae ma yan lag 'dus pa'i zhes pa'i don du
T02D2584:110b-46: lus ngag yid gsum gyis sprul lo zhes pa'i don
T02D2584:110b-47: to // sbyor ba 'di ni zhes pa /

T02D2584:110b-50: phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin gsum las 'byung ngo zhes pa'i don to //

T02D2584:110b-53: du gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /

T02D2584:111a-3: de ltar bsam pa de la mchod bstod bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2584:111a-4: dga' bas mchod la glu yis bstod //
T02D2584:111a-6: dga' bas mchod pa ni me tog la sogs pa dang yid kyis mchod pas so //
T02D2584:111a-7: glu yis bstod pa ni mchod pa de'i rjes la 'dud kyis bstod pa ste /
T02D2584:111a-8: mchog spyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
T02D2584:111a-9: ces pa la sogs pa nyi shus bstod pa'o //

T02D2584:111a-12: gsol gdab phyag la sogs pa dang //
T02D2584:111a-13: bcu yi yan lag kun 'dus pas //
T02D2584:111a-14: zhes pa'i don ni 'di lta ste //
T02D2584:111a-15: gang dag phyogs rnams thams cad na //
T02D2584:111a-16: dus rnams thams cad rab bzhugs pa'i //
T02D2584:111a-17: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D2584:111a-18: nyan thos bcas la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2584:111a-19: 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas //
T02D2584:111a-20: sngon chad sdig pa ci bgyis pa //
T02D2584:111a-21: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni //
T02D2584:111a-22: dus rnams kun gyis bshags par bgyi //
T02D2584:111a-23: sems can kun la brtse ba'i phyir //
T02D2584:111a-24: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog ste //
T02D2584:111a-25: bla med dkon mchog gsum po la //
T02D2584:111a-26: byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi //
T02D2584:111a-27: sangs rgyas kun dang de yi sras //
T02D2584:111a-28: shes rab can la bdag dbul gyis //
T02D2584:111a-29: de rnams kun gyis bdag bzhes la //
T02D2584:111a-30: 'bras bu rgya chen stsal du gsol //
T02D2584:111a-31: sdug bsngal chu bo'i nang gnas pa //
T02D2584:111a-32: skye bo kun du spyod ba dang //
T02D2584:111a-33: rgyal ba'i bzhed pa bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:111a-34: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas //
T02D2584:111a-35: sangs rgyas kun dang de yi sras //
T02D2584:111a-36: shes rab che dang nyan thos dang //
T02D2584:111a-37: rang rgyal rnams dang skye bo yi //
T02D2584:111a-38: dge ba de la rjes su smon //
T02D2584:111a-39: byang chub snying por nyer gnas pa'i //
T02D2584:111a-40: gang dag byang chub phyogs rtogs pa'i //
T02D2584:111a-41: bdag gis gsol bas rgyal ba rnams //
T02D2584:111a-42: 'khor lo dam pa bskor du gsol //
T02D2584:111a-43: bya ba thams cad byas nas ni //
T02D2584:111a-44: sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das gnas pa //
T02D2584:111a-45: bdag gis gsol bas rgyas pa kun //

T02D2584:111a-47: srid pa'i btson ra'i nang gnas pa'i //
T02D2584:111a-48: sems can thams cad bde gyur cig / rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i //
T02D2584:111a-49: sangs rgyas skal dang ldan par 'gyur //
T02D2584:111a-50: sangs rgyas kun dang de yi sras //
T02D2584:111b-0: 'gro la @111b phan phyir gzhes rnams kyis //
T02D2584:111b-1: ji ltar smon pa de bzhin du //
T02D2584:111b-2: lus ngag yid gsum legs par smon //
T02D2584:111b-3: phyag la sogs pa'i bsod nams gang //
T02D2584:111b-4: tshad med bdag gis ci bsags pa //
T02D2584:111b-5: ji ltar mgon pos mkhyen pa bzhin //
T02D2584:111b-6: byang chub tu ni de dag bsngo //
T02D2584:111b-7: yan lag bcu po de dag la//
T02D2584:111b-8: skye bo gang zhig dang mos pa //
T02D2584:111b-9: nyes pa'i bag chags kun dag nas //
T02D2584:111b-10: gsang ba mnyes pa'i snod du rung //
T02D2584:111b-11: zhes cho ga 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las gsungs so //
T02D2584:111b-12: bdag nyid rung bar 'gyur pa dang //

T02D2584:111b-15: de la dga' ba'i mdangs kyis bstod par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2584:111b-16: tshigs bcad glu yis bstod pa bya //
T02D2584:111b-18: phyag na rdo rjes zhus pa'i le'u bcu dgu pa nas //
T02D2584:111b-20: nyid kyi mdangs bzang tshogs kyis ni //

T02D2584:111b-25: nor bu 'bar ba'i sku mnga' ba //

T02D2584:111b-29: yid 'ong gsung gi skra sgrogs pa //

T02D2584:111b-31: gang g'a'i chu thigs lta grangs med //
T02D2584:111b-32: 'jig rten khams na rnam par bzhugs //

T02D2584:111b-35: mche ba gtsigs shing sgyings pa yi //
T02D2584:111b-36: 'jigs pa'i sku yi tshul gyis ni //

T02D2584:111b-45: 'gro ba'i bla ma ston pa po //
T02D2584:111b-48: byas pa'i 'bras bu yod par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2584:111b-49: dgyes pa'i bdag gi lha rnams kyis /

T02D2584:112a-8: byang chub sems ni rab tu bzung //

T02D2584:112a-21: ces pa'i bar gyis bstod do //

T02D2584:112a-23: sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste //

T02D2584:112a-26: ces pa'i bar gyis bstod do //
T02D2584:112a-27: sgo skyong bzhi po'i sgo nas bstod pa bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:112a-28: rdo rje lcags kyu 'dren pa che //
T02D2584:112a-31: ces pa'i bar gyis bstod do //

T02D2584:112a-33: byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med //
T02D2584:112a-35: pha rol phyin bcu'i gtso la 'dud //
T02D2584:112a-36: ces pa'i bar gyis bstod do //
T02D2584:112a-37: de ltar bstod pa byed pa de //
T02D2584:112a-39: rigs kyi bu gang la las dkyil 'khor gyi lha
T02D2584:112a-40: tshogs la de ltar bstod pa byas pas phyir ring
T02D2584:112a-41: po mi thogs par 'jam dpal chos kyi rgyal po
T02D2584:112a-45: gong du gsungs pa de rnams ni chos spyod thams
T02D2584:112a-46: cad kyi mchog kyang yin la thams cad kyi thog

T02D2584:112a-49: de la ma yengs par gsal dgos pas na /
T02D2584:112a-50: sbyor pa'i 'khor lo dang po'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes gsungs so //
T02D2584:112b-0: de nas phyag lngas @112b nam mkha'i 'khor lo la mnyes par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2584:112b-1: de nas rim pa 'di ldan pas //
T02D2584:112b-3: de nas gong du bstod pa byas pa'i de ma thag pa'o //
T02D2584:112b-4: rim pa 'og nas 'byung ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2584:112b-6: thams cad nam mkha'i 'khor lo'i tshogs //
T02D2584:112b-8: btsal nas ci byed ce na /

T02D2584:112b-11: de gang gis btsal zhe na /

T02D2584:112b-30: yod med rtag chad mtha' la mi 'jug pa //

T02D2584:113b-34: aom padma gu hya aa bhi shinytsa hr'i:/
T02D2584:113b-35: aom karma gu hya aa bhi shinytsa aa:/
T02D2584:113b-36: aom pra dznyo pa yo sa ma yo ga aa
T02D2584:113b-37: bhi shinytsa h'um a'a: zhes pas dbang bskur bar bya'o
T02D2584:113b-39: rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba bo //
T02D2584:113b-41: de nas tshogs sogs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams bdag la bsgrub par bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:113b-42: de nas nam mkha'i 'khor lo'i tshogs //
T02D2584:113b-44: de nas bi dbang bskur ba'i de ma thag pa'o //
T02D2584:113b-45: nam mkha'i 'khor lo'i tshogs ni tshogs mdun na sprul pa'i lha rnams so //
T02D2584:113b-46: ma lus bdag gis bsdu bar bya //
T02D2584:113b-47: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig bzhi go sla'o //
T02D2584:113b-48: slar gso lus dang ldan par bya //
T02D2584:113b-49: zhes pa rnam smin gyi phung po sbyangs nas ye
T02D2584:113b-50: shes kyi lus snang la rang bzhin med pa gsal
T02D2584:113b-51: la rnyog pa med pa 'jam tshon lta bu bsam
T02D2584:113b-52: par bya'o // de yang rdo rje gur gyi rgyud las /
T02D2584:113b-53: ji ltar chu nang zla ba de //
T02D2584:113b-54: bden min brdzun pa med pa ltar //
T02D2584:114a-2: ; lus kyang rang bzhin rtog pa med //
T02D2584:114a-4: de nas mngon par byang chub pa lnga bsgom pa ni dkyus nyid na gsal lo //
T02D2584:114a-5: de nas zhes pa ni mngon par byang chub pa lnga bsgom pa'i de ma thag pa'o //
T02D2584:114a-7: dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi nga rgyal lo //
T02D2584:114a-8: 'khrul pa'i tshul du zhes pa'i dam tshig nyis ni
T02D2584:114a-9: dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs ka nas aa las
T02D2584:114a-10: 'od 'phros // chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar byas pa'o //
T02D2584:114a-11: sgyu ma'i tshul du nam mkha' la zla ba'i dkyil
T02D2584:114a-12: 'khor gyi steng na a'a li dang k'a li skar
T02D2584:114a-13: ma'i rnam pa lta bur gyur te de ka la
T02D2584:114a-14: / skar ma'i tshogs 'dra rab bsgoms te //
T02D2584:114a-16: de las 'byung ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig bcu ni dkyus na gsal lo //
T02D2584:114a-17: byang chub sems ni rab bskyed dang /
T02D2584:114a-18: zhes pa'i gong du gsungs pa ltar sems can rnams
T02D2584:114a-19: kyi dug rnam pa lnga 'od zer gyis sbyangs nas
T02D2584:114a-20: // gzod byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed du gzhug pa'o //
T02D2584:114a-21: de yang ji ltar gzhug ce na /
T02D2584:114a-22: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02D2584:114a-24: de nas sngon par gzung ba dang bcu yongs sus dag pa ni sngon du bstan pas so //
T02D2584:114a-25: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul rab bstan te //
T02D2584:114a-26: zhes pa ni mdzad pa bcu gnyis so //
T02D2584:114a-28: 'khor lo'i tshogs zhes pa ni 'khor lo'i rim pa gsum dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2584:114a-29: phreng ba bzhi dang ldan pa'i zhes pa ni 'khor
T02D2584:114a-30: lo'i rim pa gsum sgo bar ma'i mu khyud dang
T02D2584:114a-31: bzhi'o // rdo rje dbyings dang lha zhes pa ni
T02D2584:114a-32: rdo rje dbyings dang lha rnams 'dra ba'i phyir ro
T02D2584:114a-33: bzhi'o // // de nas phyi rol dgod bya ba //
T02D2584:114a-34: zhes pa ni phyi ma man chad kyi rgyan bstan pa'o //
T02D2584:114a-35: rdo rje phreng bas yongs bskor ba'i //
T02D2584:114a-36: zhes pa ni phyi'i rdo rje'i ra ba'o //
T02D2584:114a-37: ka ba brgyad dang ldan pa la //
T02D2584:114a-39: gzhal yas khang gi nang du'o //
T02D2584:114a-40: de yang gang du gzugs she na /
T02D2584:114a-41: phyogs re re nas rtsig pa la brten pa'i ka ba gnyis zhes gsungs so //
T02D2584:114a-42: rdul tshon lnga po nyid kyis ni //
T02D2584:114a-44: dra ba dra phyed dag gis klubs //
T02D2584:114a-45: zhes pa ni dbus na mchog yod pa ni dra
T02D2584:114a-46: ba yin la dbus na mchog med pa ni dra
T02D2584:114a-47: ba phyed pa'o // dkyil 'khor ni phyi rol du
T02D2584:114b-0: zhes pa ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor sgo @114b rgyan bstan
T02D2584:114b-1: ba phyed pa'o // pa'o // ji ltar gsungs pa'i rtags thams cad //
T02D2584:114b-2: khyad par du ni mngon bsdus pa //
T02D2584:114b-3: de ni thams cad bya ba yin //
T02D2584:114b-4: zhes pa ni rta babs ni mchod rten lta bu'am /
T02D2584:114b-5: 'on te ci mdzes par byas la /
T02D2584:114b-6: rin po che'i tog dang chun 'phyangs dang mdzes pa'i g-yu bya kha sprod dang /
T02D2584:114b-7: dar la sogs pas phyi'i sku la brgyan pa'o //
T02D2584:114b-8: sgo yi rgyan dang tva ra na //
T02D2584:114b-9: shin tu gcig nyid mi bya'o //
T02D2584:114b-10: zhes pa ni nang gi dkyil 'khor la rta babs
T02D2584:114b-11: la sogs pa'i rgyan gdags par bya ba ma yin
T02D2584:114b-12: pa'o // de yang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las gsungs
T02D2584:114b-13: pa nang gi dkyil 'khor ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2584:114b-14: phyed kyi tshad la gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi
T02D2584:114b-15: pa rta babs med pa'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D2584:114b-16: nang gi sgo la rgyan med la phyi'i sku la rgyan la sogs pas brgyan pa bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:114b-18: tva ra na rnams gdags pa yin //
T02D2584:114b-20: de nas lha rnams kyi gdan bskyed pa ni go rims bzhin lha rnams kyi zhes pa nas //
T02D2584:114b-21: yid kyi yul de goms par bya //
T02D2584:114b-22: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te dkyus na gsal lo //
T02D2584:114b-23: de dag ni gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes pa
T02D2584:114b-24: ni de dag gi gong du gsungs pa'i ting nge
T02D2584:114b-25: 'dzin rnams so // gzhi ni yang dag pa'i gzhi yin pas gzhi'o //
T02D2584:114b-26: de don nan tan du ma g-yengs par bya dgos pas ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D2584:114b-27: de nas rkyen gyis bsgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2584:114b-28: de nas rkyen gyis bslang ba ni //
T02D2584:114b-30: de nas de ni de ma thag pa'o //
T02D2584:114b-31: rkyen gyis bslang ba ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i lha tshogs bskyed pa'i rkyen no //
T02D2584:114b-32: de dbus 'khor lo ni 'khor lo drug tu rdo
T02D2584:114b-33: rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2584:114b-36: shes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad bskyed do zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2584:114b-37: de yang ji ltar bskyed ce na /
T02D2584:114b-38: stong ba'i ngang las chu la chu bur rdol ba'i
T02D2584:114b-39: tshul du pam las seng ge'i khri'i steng du pam
T02D2584:114b-40: las sna tshogs padma las nyi ma /
T02D2584:114b-41: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nya gang ba lta bu //
T02D2584:114b-42: de steng rig pa aa dkar por gyur pa las 'khor lo /
T02D2584:114b-43: de yongs su gyur pa las gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad du'o //
T02D2584:114b-45: padma seng ge'i zla seng du //
T02D2584:114b-46: a'a: las bskyed pa'i rtag pa pos //
T02D2584:114b-47: gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad che //
T02D2584:114b-48: zhes pa de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2584:114b-49: rnam snang de yang ci 'dra zhe na /
T02D2584:114b-50: rnam thar bzhi ldan kun du zhal //
T02D2584:115a-0: @115a * // rnam thar bzhi ni stong pa nyid dang /
T02D2584:115a-3: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang bzhi'o //
T02D2584:115a-4: ldan pa ni de mda' ba'o //
T02D2584:115a-5: kun du zhal ni zhal bzhi ba'o //
T02D2584:115a-6: de yang phyag na rdo rjes zhus pa'i le'u bdun pa nas //
T02D2584:115a-7: phyogs bzhi'i slob dpon mnyes bya'i phyir //
T02D2584:115a-8: rnam snang zhal bzhi phyogs bzhir gzigs //
T02D2584:115a-11: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar aa
T02D2584:115a-12: las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du dha'i: dkar
T02D2584:115a-13: po dha'i: yongs su gyur pa las dang po'i sangs
T02D2584:115a-14: rgyas stobs lnga dang ldan pa'i rtags su zhal lnga
T02D2584:115a-16: de ka la rnam snang chen po'i thugs kar zla
T02D2584:115a-17: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil du yi ge dha'i: dkar
T02D2584:115a-18: po las dang po'i sangs rgyas zhal lnga pa zhes
T02D2584:115a-21: shes rab gi pha rol tu phyin pa'i busti re re bsnams pa'o zhes pa ni //
T02D2584:115a-22: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzhung dum bu bzhir bgos te /
T02D2584:115a-25: stong pa nyid kyi dum bu dang /
T02D2584:115a-26: rnam dag gi dum bu dang /
T02D2584:115a-27: mtshan dpe'i dum bu dang bzhi rnams so //
T02D2584:115a-28: de yang autpa la re'i steng na'o //
T02D2584:115a-29: de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo bsgom ste ji skad du //
T02D2584:115a-30: dang po'i sangs rgyas thugs ka ru //
T02D2584:115a-31: shes rab 'khor lo bsgom par bya //
T02D2584:115a-32: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02D2584:115a-33: rgyu rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi gnyen par sgra'i yi
T02D2584:115a-34: ge bcu gnyis bsgoms pas 'bras bu sa mchog bcu
T02D2584:115a-35: gnyis thob ste / de yang rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las //
T02D2584:115a-36: kun du 'od kyis chen po nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs te nyi ma dang 'dra'o //
T02D2584:115a-37: gnyis pa bdud rtsi'i 'od dug la rtsi gtong ba dang 'dra ste /
T02D2584:115a-39: sa gsum pa ste nam mkha'i 'od ni chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' bzhin du so sor snang ba'o //
T02D2584:115a-40: sa bzhi pa rdo rje'i 'od de yid bde ba ste ;
T02D2584:115a-41: bde ba stong pa dbyer med pa'o //
T02D2584:115a-42: sa lnga pa ni rin po che'i 'od de yid
T02D2584:115a-43: bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ste
T02D2584:115a-44: dgos pa thams cad skong bar dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D2584:115a-45: sa drug pa ste padma'i 'od de 'dod chags dang
T02D2584:115a-46: mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'joms pa'o
T02D2584:115b-0: // sa bdun pa las kyi 'od de sangs rgyas @115b kyi phrin las thams cad rdzogs pa'o //
T02D2584:115b-1: sa brgyad pa dpe med pa ste dpe las 'das pa dpe ru yod pa ma yin pa'o //
T02D2584:115b-2: sa dgu pa dpe dang ldan te /
T02D2584:115b-4: sa bcu pa ni shes rab kyi 'od ces bya ste /
T02D2584:115b-5: shes rab kyis ni don thams cad 'byed pa'o //
T02D2584:115b-6: sa bcu gcig pa ni bla na med pa'i sa
T02D2584:115b-7: rab tu 'od gsal ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T02D2584:115b-8: do // sa bcu gnyis pa ni rnal 'byor gyi
T02D2584:115b-9: ye shes rab tu so sor rig pa rdzogs pa'o
T02D2584:115b-10: do // zhes gsungs so // de ltar rgyu 'bras kyi don bshad nas //
T02D2584:115b-11: da ni 'khor lo bsgom pa'i thabs bshad de //
T02D2584:115b-12: don byas slar 'dus zhes pa la sogs pa dkyus nyid na gsal lo //
T02D2584:115b-13: sa mchog bcu gnyis rdzogs rtags su //
T02D2584:115b-15: sa mchog bcu gnyis ni gong du gsungs pa'o //
T02D2584:115b-16: sgra yig bcu gnyis dgod par bya //
T02D2584:115b-17: zhes pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba 'di yin te /
T02D2584:115b-24: de'i don ni 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud
T02D2584:115b-25: phyi ma las gsal bar gsungs te de la 'jug
T02D2584:115b-26: par bya'o // 'jam dpal 'di ni dpal gyi sku //
T02D2584:115b-27: thun mong ma yin gnyis med khyab pa'i chos //
T02D2584:115b-28: dus gsum btang snyoms rgyal ba kun gyi yab //
T02D2584:115b-29: chos dbyings yum nyid sems dpa' sras mchog ston //
T02D2584:115b-30: blo dang ldan pa gang zhig mdo 'di ni //
T02D2584:115b-31: mngon sum tshad mar bzhag nas mthong 'dod pa //
T02D2584:115b-32: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i 'khor lo'i tshul bzhin du //
T02D2584:115b-33: yi ge 'khor lo'i don gyis 'jam dpal lo /
T02D2584:115b-34: gdod nas dag cing skye ba med pa yi //
T02D2584:115b-35: aa a'a zhes pa 'dus ma byas pa'i chos //
T02D2584:115b-36: rgyu nyid med pas 'bras bu mi tshol phyir //
T02D2584:115b-37: aa ltar mnyam gzhag chos kyi sku nyid de //
T02D2584:115b-38: don dam dbyings nyid mkha' 'dra dmigs med khyab //
T02D2584:115b-39: 'byung ba rang bzhin med par gnas pa las //
T02D2584:115b-40: 'jam dpal ral gris btab nas gcod pa ltar //
T02D2584:115b-41: aa yi gu gu thugs rje rang nis 'phyo //
T02D2584:115b-42: ai a'i zhes pa chos ki yum nyid lam //
T02D2584:115b-43: shes rab pha rol phyin pa bsam pa'i dbyings //
T02D2584:115b-44: lha dang mi la blang dor med tshul gyis //
T02D2584:115b-45: thun mong ma yin stong nas kun du bzang //
T02D2584:115b-46: med pa'i ngang nyid med las 'byung ba yi //
T02D2584:115b-47: au a'u zhes pa med pa'i snying po 'byung //
T02D2584:115b-48: ye shes chen po yod med mtha' las 'das //
T02D2584:116a-0: @116a * // che ba'i ngang gis 'gro kun dge la sbyor //
T02D2584:116a-1: gnyis dang gnyis med gtan nas brjod bral ba'i //
T02D2584:116a-2: gru gsum ae yi rang bzhin nyid mi g-yo //
T02D2584:116a-3: ae aee zhes pa tha snyad bsam brjod bral //
T02D2584:116a-4: sems dang sems ni 'jam dpal ting 'dzin to //
T02D2584:116a-5: thabs dang shes rab sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshogs //
T02D2584:116a-6: ao aoo zhes pa 'du 'phro 'khrug med cing //
T02D2584:116a-7: 'ja' tshon rnam par so sor yid bzhin sbyor //
T02D2584:116a-8: 'jam dpal rnam par rol pa'i bde ba che //
T02D2584:116a-9: rnal 'byor chen po ye shes 'byor ba'i dpal //
T02D2584:116a-10: nam mkha' mi dmigs aam ste ye shes brjod //
T02D2584:116a-11: ye shes ma 'dres aa yig dbyings su 'dres //
T02D2584:116a-12: stong nyid ci la'ang ma reg lhun gyis grub //
T02D2584:116a-13: don kun 'byor pas blang dor med pa yi //
T02D2584:116a-14: bdag nyid rang bzhin gzhan dang mnyam pas na //
T02D2584:116a-15: bsam gyis mi khyab mi gnas mi sems na //
T02D2584:116a-16: 'jam dpal nyid dang yon tan rdzogs par mnyam //
T02D2584:116a-18: aa ni gdod ma nas skye ba med cing 'dus ma byas pa /
T02D2584:116a-19: rgyus ma bsgrubs pa'i phyir 'bras bu btsal du med
T02D2584:116a-20: pas gdod ma nas chos nyid bde ba chen po'o
T02D2584:116a-21: // ai ni de nyid nam mkha' ltar mi dmigs
T02D2584:116a-22: pa'i phyir shes rab chen pos de ltar gcod cing
T02D2584:116a-23: mi dmigs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'phro bas shes
T02D2584:116a-25: au ni de lta bas na kun du bzang po byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te /
T02D2584:116a-26: mtshan ma ldang ba la mi dor //
T02D2584:116a-27: mi ldang ba la mi gnas kun du bzang po'i mtha' las 'das pa chen po'o //
T02D2584:116a-28: ngang gis 'gro ba kun kyang bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin la sbyor ba'o //
T02D2584:116a-29: ae de ltar bsam brjod dang bral bas sems dang
T02D2584:116a-30: sems kyi rnam par rtog pa g-yo ba med pa
T02D2584:116a-31: ste ; 'jam dpal gyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'o //
T02D2584:116a-32: aom ni de ltar yin pas thabs kyi cho 'phrul sna tshogs su snang bas /
T02D2584:116a-33: thams cad du yang thabs shes rab sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshogs yin te /
T02D2584:116a-34: nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon bzhin du 'gro ba sna tshogs
T02D2584:116a-35: kyi yid dang mthun par sbyor ba rnams rol ba'i
T02D2584:116a-36: cho 'phrul bde ba chen por mnyam pa'o //
T02D2584:116a-37: aam thams cad 'byung gnas nam mkha'i mdzod do //
T02D2584:116a-38: aa: ni de ltar na shes rab dang ye shes
T02D2584:116a-39: chos thams cad rag ma lus pa'i 'dus pa ste
T02D2584:116a-40: / de ltar yi ge bcu gnyis kyi chos thams
T02D2584:116a-41: cad gdod ma nas blang dor med par rang bzhin
T02D2584:116b-0: @116b de ltar yin par blo la gsal zhing mi g-yon des 'jam dpal nyid yin no //
T02D2584:116b-1: yang rgyud de nyid las gsungs pa /
T02D2584:116b-2: ji ltar sgyu 'phrul dra ba las //
T02D2584:116b-4: rgyal ba rnams kyi yab dang yum //
T02D2584:116b-5: don gyi shes rab dbyings kyi phyir //
T02D2584:116b-6: thabs kyi ye shes kun 'byung ba //
T02D2584:116b-7: yi ge 'khor lo don rnams kyis //
T02D2584:116b-8: sgyu 'phrul dra ba nyid du gsal //
T02D2584:116b-9: grags ma thag tu don der gsal //
T02D2584:116b-10: aa a'a zhes pa 'jam dpal nyid //
T02D2584:116b-11: rang bzhin chos nyid sku yi dbyings //
T02D2584:116b-12: ai a'i zhes pa g-yo ba med //
T02D2584:116b-13: mi bskyod pa las yum du gsal //
T02D2584:116b-14: au a'u zhes pa skye ba med //
T02D2584:116b-15: dag pa'i ngang nyid kun du bzang //
T02D2584:116b-16: rgyud las rgyal ba'i sems dpa' che //
T02D2584:116b-17: ye shes ngang nyid gcig pa'o //
T02D2584:116b-18: ae aee zhes pa mkha' la bskor //
T02D2584:116b-19: 'bras bu med pas mkha' la gnas //
T02D2584:116b-20: de ma thag las gsal ba'i rkyen //
T02D2584:116b-21: 'jam dbyangs phra ba'i dpal gyur pa //
T02D2584:116b-22: ao aoo zhes pa ae las 'das //
T02D2584:116b-23: aom zhes gsang sngags thabs chen bstan //
T02D2584:116b-24: ae dang ao yi rang bzhin dbyings //
T02D2584:116b-25: mum ni ngo bo nyid kyi mkha' //
T02D2584:116b-26: aa las rnam par rol pas bstan //
T02D2584:116b-27: aom gyi gnyis med sbyor ba yis //
T02D2584:116b-28: zab mo'i rdo rje ting 'dzin mtha' //
T02D2584:116b-29: ma zhes mnyam dang mi mnyam med //
T02D2584:116b-30: 'jam dpal ye shes rdo rje rdzogs //
T02D2584:116b-33: mi gnas rdo rje rtse mo can //
T02D2584:116b-34: bsam rtsol sgrub pa med pa yi //
T02D2584:116b-35: dbyings nyid gzhan na yongs su rdzogs //
T02D2584:116b-37: tshul 'di yang snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2584:116b-38: de la re zhig yang aa a'a zhes pa 'jam dpal chos kyi sku'o //
T02D2584:116b-39: ai a'i ni yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'o //

T02D2584:120a-16: tshad med tshad bral yongs rdzogs pa'i //
T02D2584:120a-17: bde gshegs go 'phang bde brnyes kyang //
T02D2584:120a-19: bzang po shin tu mchog ldan bstod //
T02D2584:120a-20: mchog sbyin nang na mchog brnyes pas //
T02D2584:120a-21: kun la dngos grub mchog thob mdzad //
T02D2584:120a-22: mgon po dus gsum sgrib med pa //
T02D2584:120a-23: dngos grub dam pa stsol la bstod //
T02D2584:120a-24: de nas gtso bo'i sngags ring la zhes ba ni /
T02D2584:120a-25: aa a'a: sarba ta th'a ga ti hri da ya /
T02D2584:120a-28: bha ga b'an dzany'a na m'u rti b'a g'i shva ra ma h'a w'a tsa /
T02D2584:120a-30: aa ma la su pa ri shuddha /
T02D2584:120a-31: dharmma dh'a tu dzany'a na garbha a'a: dri shyas blta /
T02D2584:120a-32: dza: h'um bam ho: sa gnyis med bstim /
T02D2584:120a-33: aa ham gis nga rgyal bya /
T02D2584:120a-34: aom badzra yaksha zhes pas bgegs bsal lo //
T02D2584:120a-35: de nas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab par bstan ba'i phyir /
T02D2584:120a-36: bzhi yis rgyas gdab don mchog sgrub / ces gsungs te //
T02D2584:120a-37: bzhi ni phyag rgya bzhi ste /
T02D2584:120a-39: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2584:120a-41: phyag rgya chen po dang bzhi'o //
T02D2584:120a-42: de la dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni /
T02D2584:120a-43: snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgoms la /
T02D2584:120a-44: phyag g-yon thams cad na rang rang gi mtshan ma 'dzin pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2584:120a-45: lce la yi ge hr'i: las padma de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D2584:120a-46: de'i steng du h'um las rdo rje'i dbus su hr'i:
T02D2584:120a-47: las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med
T02D2584:120a-48: pa sku mdog dmar por bsams la /
T02D2584:120a-49: de'i lce la yi ge aa bsams te sngags kyi
T02D2584:120a-50: yan lag thams cad rdzogs pa ni chos kyi phyag
T02D2584:120b-0: @120b rgya'o // aa las sna tshogs rdo rje lha thams cad kyi spyi bor bsams la /
T02D2584:120b-1: gar las byung ba'i g-yas thams cad na ral gri bsam pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2584:120b-2: ji ltar bris pa'i rjes su mthun par gang dang
T02D2584:120b-3: gang gi gzugs su gsal zhing de'i ngo bo rnam
T02D2584:120b-4: par dag pa ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D2584:120b-5: de ltar phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa de la yang dag pa'i don bsgrub pas na /
T02D2584:120b-6: bzhi yis rgyas gdab don mchog 'grub //
T02D2584:120b-9: rdo rje rnon po ral gri che //
T02D2584:120b-10: yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag //
T02D2584:120b-12: phyag rgya bzhi yi don ston pa //
T02D2584:120b-14: de nas mchod ba'i bye brag gis /
T02D2584:120b-16: mchod rdzas rnams bsangs la byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2584:120b-17: yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor de la mchod pa'i bye brag thams cad kyis mchod do //
T02D2584:120b-19: bdag las mi gnyis ba de yis so //
T02D2584:120b-20: de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa'i bstod pas kyang bstod do //
T02D2584:120b-21: mchod nas phyag rgya bzhi bya ba //
T02D2584:120b-23: phyag rgya bzhi'i don dang ldan par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2584:120b-24: dang po sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i gnas su bya
T02D2584:120b-25: ba'i rim pa'o zhes pa'i don ni 'di yin te
T02D2584:120b-26: / aa las 'od byung zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar byas /
T02D2584:120b-27: de las ye shes sems dpa' de las shes rab 'khor lo /
T02D2584:120b-28: de las dang po'i sangs rgyas de las gzhi'i sangs rgyas /
T02D2584:120b-29: de las lha tshogs de las gzhal yas khang de las sna tshogs rdo rje de las chos 'byung /
T02D2584:120b-30: de las byang chub chen po'i mchod rten /
T02D2584:120b-31: de las rdo rje'i sgo drug nas 'thon te /
T02D2584:120b-32: shar phyogs dge ba'i sgo la sogs pa nas 'od zer 'thon te /
T02D2584:120b-35: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byas te /
T02D2584:120b-36: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi thugs kar zhugs /
T02D2584:120b-37: dpal gyi be'u la bskor ba lan gsum byas /
T02D2584:120b-38: shes rab dang ye shes kyi bcud bsdus /
T02D2584:120b-39: slar rim gyis bzhi po'i aa la thim ste /
T02D2584:120b-40: snang stong gnyis med kyi ngo bor rtogs par bya'o //
T02D2584:120b-41: de ltar 'phro 'du bya zhing bsgom pa ni bsnyen pa bsdus pa'o //
T02D2584:120b-42: aom sarba dharma aa bh'a ba sva bh'a ba bi
T02D2584:120b-43: shu dadha badzra aa a'a aam aa: zhes rtsa ba'i
T02D2584:120b-44: sngags bzla zhing 'phro 'du byed pa ni bsnyen pa
T02D2584:120b-45: 'bring po'o // bsnyen pa rgyas pa ni rdo rje
T02D2584:120b-46: dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang thob pa yin na
T02D2584:121a-3: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog / ces pa'i bar du'o //
T02D2584:121a-4: tshigs su bcad pa bcu bzhi brjod pas ye shes
T02D2584:121a-5: sems dpa'i thugs ka'i aa las yi ge brgyad cu
T02D2584:121a-6: rtsa drug 'phros pas rnam par snang mdzad mang por
T02D2584:121a-7: gyur te / zhing khams thams cad snang zhing mchod gti mug can gyi don byas /
T02D2584:121a-8: slar gzhi'i lha rnams la thim par bya zhing bklags
T02D2584:121a-9: na ring po mi thogs par chos kyi rgyal por
T02D2584:121a-10: 'gyur te / de ni bsnyen pa rgyas pa'o //
T02D2584:121a-11: de nas thun gtong bar 'dod na /
T02D2584:121a-12: mchod pa'i yo byad rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2584:121a-13: bdag las mi gnyis pa'i gzugs su rim pa nas rim par 'od zer gyi tshul du 'thon te /
T02D2584:121a-14: las kyi bya ba la sogs pa la 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2584:121a-15: de nas thun gnyis pa la bdag las mi gnyis
T02D2584:121a-16: pa'i gzugs can de sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rdzogs
T02D2584:121a-17: nas / 'od zer gyi tshul du rim pa nas rim par gzhi la thim ste /
T02D2584:121a-18: de nas ci rigs pa ru mchod bstod byas la
T02D2584:121a-19: don gsum po gang yang rung ba cig la 'jug
T02D2584:121a-20: par bya'o // de nas yang gtong bar 'dod na sngon du bstan pa lta bur bya'o //
T02D2584:121a-21: de nas thun gsum pa la sngon du bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin byas la /
T02D2584:121a-22: thun tha ma la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor de
T02D2584:121a-23: aom manydzu shr'i badzra mu: zhes mdun gyi nam mkha'
T02D2584:121a-24: la phye nas bzhugs pa de la mchod pa dang
T02D2584:121a-25: bstod pa dang / bshags pa byas la gshegs su gsol /
T02D2584:121a-26: bskyed pa'i mtshan rnams bdag gi thugs kar bsdus la /
T02D2584:121a-27: dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi nga rgyal dang ldan par byas te ci bde bar spyod lam bya'o //
T02D2584:121a-28: rnal 'byor don dang ldan pa yis //
T02D2584:121a-29: 'bad nas thun gsum dag gis ni //
T02D2584:121a-30: lha yi rnal 'byor bsgom pa na //
T02D2584:121a-31: nges par chos kyi rgyal po thob //
T02D2584:121a-32: ces le'u khri drug stong pa las gsungs so //
T02D2584:121a-34: dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa //
T02D2584:121a-36: de ltar rnal 'byor pas zla ba gsum mam /
T02D2584:121a-38: 'on te dus rgyun du ma chad par bsgoms na
T02D2584:121a-39: don gyi rtags sam lha'i snang ba gsal ba dang
T02D2584:121a-40: / gzod bsnyen pa'i las la 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2584:121a-41: de nas snang ba mtha' yas la me tog phog ste /
T02D2584:121b-0: de'i rnal 'byor byed par 'dod na sngon du bstan pa'i gnas @121b yid dang 'thad pa ru /
T02D2584:121b-1: yo byad la sogs pa tshul bzhin bshams la /
T02D2584:121b-3: lce lag byin gyis brlab pa nas gzhal yas khang bskyed pa yan chad rdzogs par bya ste /
T02D2584:121b-4: gtso bo'i gnas su hr'i: las ni /
T02D2584:121b-6: spro dang bsdu ba sngon bzhin bya //
T02D2584:121b-7: zhes pa'i bar gyis sbyor ba dang po rdzogs par byas la gzod dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bsgoms te /
T02D2584:121b-8: snang pa mtha' yas kyi thugs ka ru dang po'i
T02D2584:121b-9: sangs rgyas de'i lte ba la rdo rje rnon po
T02D2584:121b-10: de'i thugs kar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i
T02D2584:121b-12: de las 'od 'phros pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor snang bar byas /
T02D2584:121b-13: rdo rje rnon po snang bar byas /
T02D2584:121b-14: gtso bo snang ba mtha' yas snang bar byas /
T02D2584:121b-15: gdan dang gzhal yas khang snang bar byas /
T02D2584:121b-16: rdo rje rgya gram snang bar byas /
T02D2584:121b-18: byang chub chen po'i mchod rten snang bar byas /
T02D2584:121b-19: ye shes kyi rdo rje sgo drug nas 'thon nas zhing khams drug snang bar byas /
T02D2584:121b-20: sangs rgyas la mchod pa byas /
T02D2584:121b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bcud bsdus /
T02D2584:121b-23: slar rdo rje la bskor ba lan gsum byas rdo
T02D2584:121b-24: rje'i sgo drug nas tshur rim pa rim par hr'i:
T02D2584:121b-25: la thim ste / hr'i:'i byin rlabs kyis mtshan gyi yi ge nyis brgya nyi shur gyur te ;
T02D2584:121b-26: de la yang gong ma ltar spro bsdu byas pas phyag mtshan du gyur to //
T02D2584:121b-27: de la spro bsdu byas te /
T02D2584:121b-28: sngags ring brjod pas lha nyis brgya nyi shur gyur te /
T02D2584:121b-29: de yang pho brang gi dbus su bdun 'khor lo
T02D2584:121b-30: brgyad la drug drug lha rnams kyi phyogs bzhi la
T02D2584:121b-31: nga lnga nga lnga shes par bya'o //
T02D2584:121b-32: de yang ye shes lnga'i ngo bo ste ;
T02D2584:121b-33: rigs chung gi dbye bas so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /
T02D2584:121b-34: de bzhin du mnyam pa nyid dang /
T02D2584:121b-36: chos kyi dbyings dang lngar shes par bya'o //
T02D2584:121b-37: de nas las rgyal mchog dang /
T02D2584:121b-38: ye shes sems dpa' sgrub pa dang /
T02D2584:121b-39: bsnyen pa 'bring po yan chad mthun no //
T02D2584:121b-40: bsnyen pa rgyas pa byed na /
T02D2584:121b-41: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
T02D2584:121b-43: ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal //
T02D2584:121b-44: zhes pa'i bar du tshigs su bcad pa bzhi bcu zhe gnyis brjod pa /
T02D2584:122a-0: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i hr'i: las mtshan gyi yi ge nyis brgya bdun cu rtsa @122a * //

T02D2584:122a-2: du 'phros pas las gnyis byas 'dod chags can gyi
T02D2584:122a-3: rgyud sbyangs te / slar bzhi po la thim pas

T02D2584:122a-42: pho brang gi dbus su bdun /
T02D2584:122a-44: phyogs bzhir lha snam la bcu bzhi bcu bzhi dgod par bya'o //

T02D2584:123a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bcud bsdus /

T02D2584:123a-32: kha dog drug dang ldan pa'i 'od zer de rim pa rim par aa la thim pas /
T02D2584:123a-33: aa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis mtshan gyi yi ge bdun cu rtsa drug tu gyur /
T02D2584:123a-34: de rang rang gnas su spros so //
T02D2584:123a-35: de la spro bsdu byas pas phyag mtshan du gyur to //
T02D2584:123a-36: de nas spro bsdu byas te sngags ring brjod pas lha bdun cu rtsa bdun du gyur to //
T02D2584:123a-37: de yang pho brang gi dbus su bdun /
T02D2584:123a-38: phyogs bzhir 'khor lo la gnyis gnyis mtshams bzhir re
T02D2584:123a-39: re phyogs bzhi'i lha rnams la bcu dgu bcu dgu
T02D2584:123a-40: shes par bya'o // de yang bya ba grub pa'i
T02D2584:123a-41: ye shes me long lta bu la sogs pa shes
T02D2584:123b-0: shes par bya'o // par @123b bya'o // mthun no // rgyas par byed na /
T02D2584:123b-1: sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba //
T02D2584:123b-3: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog / ces pa'i
T02D2584:123b-4: bar gyis tshigs bcad bco lnga brjod pas yi ge
T02D2584:123b-5: dgu bcu rtsa lngar gyur te /
T02D2584:123b-6: don yod grub pas don gnyis byas /
T02D2584:123b-7: le lo can gyi rgyud sbyangs nas slar rim gyis gzhi la thim par bya zhing bzlas so //
T02D2584:123b-8: thun mtshams ni gong dang mthun no //
T02D2584:123b-9: de nas rin chen 'byung ldan la me tog phog
T02D2584:123b-10: nas de'i rnal 'byor byed par 'dod na yid dang
T02D2584:123b-11: mthun pa'i gnas su yo byad la sogs pa gzhung
T02D2584:123b-14: lce lag byin gyis brlab pa nas gzhal yas khang bskyed pa yan chad sngon bzhin byas la /
T02D2584:123b-15: de nas sngon bzhin dkyil 'khor zhes pa nas /
T02D2584:123b-16: spro dang bsdu ba sngon bzhin bya //
T02D2584:123b-17: zhes pa'i bar gyis sbyor ba dang po rdzogs par byas la /
T02D2584:123b-18: de nas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bsgom ste /
T02D2584:123b-19: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dang po'i sangs rgyas /
T02D2584:123b-20: de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo //
T02D2584:123b-21: de'i lte ba la ngag gi dbang phyug / de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D2584:123b-22: de'i lte ba la yi ge aa /
T02D2584:123b-23: de las 'od 'phros pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor snang bar byas /
T02D2584:123b-24: ngag gi dbang phyug shes rab 'khor lo /
T02D2584:123b-26: gtso bo gzhal yas khang rdo rje rgya gram /
T02D2584:123b-28: byang chub chen po'i mchod rten snang bar byas te /
T02D2584:123b-29: ye shes kyi rdo rje'i sgo drug nas 'thon zhing khams drug snang bar byas don gnyis byas /
T02D2584:123b-30: bde bar gshegs pa'i bcud bsdus /
T02D2584:123b-31: slar rdo rje la bskor ba lan gsum byas /
T02D2584:123b-32: kha dog drug dang ldan pa'i 'od zer de slar
T02D2584:123b-33: rim pa rim pas aa la thim pas aa'i byin
T02D2584:123b-34: gyi rlabs kyis mtshan gyi yi ge brgyad cu rtsa
T02D2584:123b-35: bzhi rang rang gi gnas su spros te /
T02D2584:123b-36: de spros bsdus pas phyag mtshan du gyur to //
T02D2584:123b-37: de nas spro bsdu byas nas sngags ring brjod pas lha brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i ngo bor gyur te /
T02D2584:123b-38: pho brang gi dbus su bzhi /
T02D2584:123b-40: phyogs bzhi'i lha snam la nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig 'di dag kun la lha mo brgyad brgyad /
T02D2584:124a-1: kun la bkod par shes par bya'o //
T02D2584:124a-2: rigs kha phral gyi dkyil 'khor lnga bo 'di ni
T02D2584:124a-3: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa sgo rkyang pa re las
T02D2584:124a-4: med do // de nas las bcol ba dang /
T02D2584:124a-5: bsnyen pa 'bring po yan chad mthun no //
T02D2584:124a-7: 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste /
T02D2584:124a-9: nor bu chen po rin chen tog / ces pa'i
T02D2584:124a-10: bar du tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa bzhi brjod pas
T02D2584:124a-11: sngags kyi yi ge brgya rtsa bzhi byung ste /
T02D2584:124a-12: rin chen 'byung ldan mang po gyur te /
T02D2584:124a-13: las gnyis byas nas ser sna can gyi rgyud sbyangs te /
T02D2584:124a-14: slar rim gyis gzhi bo la thim mo //
T02D2584:124a-15: thun mtshams ni gong dang mthun no //
T02D2584:124a-16: de rnams ni rigs kha phral ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2584:124a-17: de nas rigs bsdus pa byang sems rdo rje byed
T02D2584:124a-18: par 'dod na yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su yo
T02D2584:124a-19: byad la sogs pa gzhung bzhin du bshams la /
T02D2584:124a-21: lce lag byin gyis brlab pa nas /
T02D2584:124a-22: sna tshogs rdo rje yan chad sngon bzhin bsgoms la /
T02D2584:124a-23: de'i lte ba la yi ge bhr'um las gyur ba'i gzhal yas khang /
T02D2584:124a-24: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa /
T02D2584:124a-25: dbus na dkyil 'khor sgo rkyang pa lnga yod pa lha'i snam bu la sogs pa dang ldan pa /
T02D2584:124a-27: rgyan thams cad phyi'i sgo la brgyan pa'o //
T02D2584:124a-28: dkyil 'khor drug po de la ji ltar gsungs pa'i gdan thams cad bsam par bya'o //
T02D2584:124a-29: de'i dbus su sa las seng ge'i khri /
T02D2584:124a-30: de'i steng du pam las sna tshogs padma /
T02D2584:124a-31: de'i steng du aa dkar po yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje /
T02D2584:124a-32: de yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das byang
T02D2584:124a-33: sems rdo rje sku mdog dkar po gzhon nu'i tshul
T02D2584:124a-34: can dbu la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa
T02D2584:124a-35: / rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa bskyed la /
T02D2584:124a-36: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D2584:124a-37: de'i steng du dang po'i sangs rgyas /
T02D2584:124a-38: de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa
T02D2584:124a-39: la yi ge 'bru dgu la bdun la re re
T02D2584:124a-41: phreng ba'i yi ge rnams gzhan dang mthun /
T02D2584:124a-42: de'i lte ba la aa las bskyed pa'i aa ra
T02D2584:124a-43: pa tsa na mdog dkar pa de'i thugs kar zla
T02D2584:124a-44: ba'i dkyil 'khor / de'i steng na yi ge aa
T02D2584:124a-45: dkar po de las 'od kha dog rnam pa drug
T02D2584:124b-0: 'od des mi shes pa'i @124b ri bo bcom nas
T02D2584:124b-1: rang gi lus nyid snang bar byed pa bsgom par
T02D2584:124b-2: bya'o // snang bar gyur ma thag tu rim pa nas 'od rim par gsal bar byas te /
T02D2584:124b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byas so /
T02D2584:124b-4: de nas rdo rje'i sgo drug nas kha dog drug dang ldan pa'i 'od de byung ste /
T02D2584:124b-5: nam mkha'i khams kun khyab par byas nas /
T02D2584:124b-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams gsal bar gyur to //
T02D2584:124b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bcud bsdus /
T02D2584:124b-9: thugs dpal gyi be'u la bskor ba lan gsum byas /
T02D2584:124b-10: shes rab dang ye shes bkug nas rim pa nas rim par thim ste /
T02D2584:124b-11: snying ga'i zla ba la gnas pa'i sngags dang gcig
T02D2584:124b-12: tu 'dres par gyur nas de nyid brtan par yang
T02D2584:124b-14: de ltar bsgoms pas phyir ring por mi thogs pas ye shes kyi sgo nas sku dang /
T02D2584:124b-16: zla ba'i sgo nas thugs dang gsum thob ste /
T02D2584:124b-17: sprul pa'i sku yang thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2584:124b-18: de ltar sbyor ba dang po rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bsgom ste /
T02D2584:124b-19: gtso bo byang sems rdo rje'i thugs kar gdan zla ba la sogs pa drug gsal bar byas la /
T02D2584:124b-20: de'i aa las 'od 'phros pas rim pa nas rim par gsal bar byas te /
T02D2584:124b-21: don gnyis byas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bcud bsdus /
T02D2584:124b-22: slar rim pa nas rim par aa la thim pas /
T02D2584:124b-23: aa'i byin gyi rlabs las mtshan gyi yi ge lnga
T02D2584:124b-24: bcu rtsa gsum du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2584:124b-25: la spros so // de la spro pa dang bsdu ba byas nas phyag mtshan du gyur to //
T02D2584:124b-26: de nas yang spro bsdu byas nas sngags ring brjod
T02D2584:124b-27: pas lha lnga bcu rtsa gsum gyi ngo bor gyur
T02D2584:124b-28: to // de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi cho 'phrul gyis lha bzhi bcu rtsa bzhir sprul lo //
T02D2584:124b-29: de nas mi bskyod pa'i cho 'phrul gyis lha lnga bcu rtsa gnyis su sprul lo //
T02D2584:124b-30: de nas snang ba mtha' yas kyi cho 'phrul gyis lha nyis brgya nyi shur sprul lo //
T02D2584:124b-31: de nas rin chen 'byung ldan gyi cho 'phrul gyis lha lnga bcu rtsa bzhir sprul lo ;
T02D2584:124b-32: / de nas don yod pa'i cho 'phrul gyis lha bdun cu rtsa drug tu sprul lo //
T02D2584:124b-33: spyir dkyil 'khor drug po 'di la mtshan brgyad brgya dang /
T02D2584:124b-35: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la mtshan sum cu
T02D2584:124b-36: so gsum phri bas lha ni bdun brgya bdun cu
T02D2584:125a-1: bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor la dgod na /
T02D2584:125a-2: dgod rgyu drug brgya sum cu so gsum mo //
T02D2584:125a-3: de'i lhag ma dbus su thim pa brgya bzhi bcu
T02D2584:125a-4: zhe drug yod pa la rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor
T02D2584:125a-5: du sum cu so bdun thim /
T02D2584:125a-7: snang ba mtha' yas su lnga bcu rtsa lnga /
T02D2584:125a-8: rin chen 'byung ldan du nyi shu tham pa /
T02D2584:125a-9: don yod grug par bcu dgu ste brgya bzhi bcu zhe drug go //
T02D2584:125a-10: de ltar dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bskyed dpa'i dus su rdo rje dbyings ni byang sems rdo rjes so //
T02D2584:125a-11: lhag ma ni rang rang gi cho 'phrul byas te /
T02D2584:125a-13: gzhi'i sangs rgyas dang thugs ka'i ye shes sems dpa' bdag gi blo yis bsgyur bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2584:125a-14: de ka la shes rab 'khor lo bdun 'gyur gyi gdams ngag ces bya'o //
T02D2584:125a-15: de ltar dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bsgoms nas de nas
T02D2584:125a-16: las bcol ba dang bsnyen pa 'bring po yan chad
T02D2584:125a-17: mthun no // rgyas par klog na sngags kyi tshig brjod pa dang mu khyud dang /
T02D2584:125a-18: 'khor lo kun la 'od byung nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gyur par spros te /
T02D2584:125a-19: mchod cing bskul la don byas nas slar 'dus te
T02D2584:125a-20: dkyil 'khor chen por rang gi gnas su bzhugs pa'am
T02D2584:125a-21: / mi lcogs na yig 'bru rnams la thim pa'o //
T02D2584:125a-22: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //
T02D2584:125a-24: rdo rje lcags kyu zhugs pa che //
T02D2584:125a-25: zhes pa'i tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa lngar rkang pa gcig gis ma tshang ba brjod nas /
T02D2584:125a-26: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i aa las sgra yig
T02D2584:125a-27: brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'phros pas rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2584:125a-28: mang por gyur te zhing khams thams cad snang zhing
T02D2584:125a-29: mchod / gti mug can btul nas 'khor lo dang po'i yi ge la thim pa'am skur gnas pa'o //
T02D2584:125a-30: de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed ces pa nas /
T02D2584:125a-31: sgra dang ldan pa rnam skyi mchog / ces pa'i
T02D2584:125a-32: bar du tshigs bcad bcu dang rkang pa gcig gis
T02D2584:125a-33: lhag pa brjod pas snga ma bzhin du khro bo
T02D2584:125a-34: spros te / zhe sdang can gtul nas 'khor lo gnyis pa'o //
T02D2584:125a-35: yang dag bdag med ces bya ba nas ye shes
T02D2584:125a-36: me lce'i bar du tshigs bcad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
T02D2584:125a-37: brjod pas yi ge nyis brgya bdun cu rtsa lnga
T02D2584:125a-38: byung ste / 'od dpag tu med pas 'dod chags can btul nas 'khor lo gsum pa'o //
T02D2584:125b-1: rin chen tog gi bar du tshigs bcad nyi shu
T02D2584:125b-2: rtsa bzhi brjod pas sngags kyi yi ge brgyad cu
T02D2584:125b-3: rtsa bzhi byung nas nam mkha'i snying por gyur nas
T02D2584:125b-4: ser sna can btul nas 'khor lo bzhi pa'o //
T02D2584:125b-5: sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba nas /
T02D2584:125b-6: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog gi bar du
T02D2584:125b-7: tshigs bcad bco lnga brjod pas yi ge dgu bcu
T02D2584:125b-9: don yod grub pas le lo can btul nas slar lnga bar gnas so //
T02D2584:125b-10: 'khor lo drug ni thams cad spyi'o //
T02D2584:125b-11: de nas mchod sbyin la sogs pa'i don bsdus pa'am bstod pa'o //
T02D2584:125b-12: sngags ni gong du bkod pa nyid do //
T02D2584:125b-13: de nas la sogs pa ni yi rang ba'i bstod pa'o //
T02D2584:125b-14: phan yon yang brjod par bya ste /
T02D2584:125b-15: bdag dang gzhan spro ba bskyed pa'o //
T02D2584:125b-16: de nas thun mtshams ni gong dang mthun no //
T02D2584:125b-17: de yan chad ni gong du bsnyen pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D2584:125b-18: de nas rdul tshon gyi cho ga'i rim pa bstan te /
T02D2584:125b-19: de nas rang dga'i gnas nyid du //
T02D2584:125b-20: zhes pa ni lha khang ngam /
T02D2584:125b-24: yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2584:125b-25: de ka la gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya zhes gsungs pa kho na'o //
T02D2584:125b-26: sa de yongs su gzhung bzhin sbyang /
T02D2584:125b-27: gzung dang ldan pas gzhung bzhin du bya pa'i bye brag gzhan na'o //
T02D2584:125b-28: zhes gsungs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02D2584:125b-30: zla re 'am lo re nyid du ji ltar mos pa dga' bar bsgrub cing /
T02D2584:125b-31: zla ba yar ngo la cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02D2584:125b-32: de la rgyal pos khru brgya'am /
T02D2584:125b-34: blon po dang blon po chen po rnams kyis khru ni lnga bcu 'am nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
T02D2584:125b-35: ded dpon nam tshong dpon rnams kyis khru nyi shu rtsa lnga'am de'i phyed do //
T02D2584:125b-36: sgrub pa po rnams kyis khru bcu gnyis sam drug pa'am ci nus pa bya'o //
T02D2584:125b-37: de la dang por re zhig yo byad thams cad
T02D2584:125b-38: yang dag par ldan pa'i mngon par 'dod pa'i dkyil
T02D2584:125b-40: mi rus kyi phye ma'i sbyin sreg gi dkyil 'khor gyis bgegs nye bar bzlog la /
T02D2584:125b-41: bdag dang slob ma la zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2584:125b-42: de nas sa sbyang bar bya ste /
T02D2584:125b-44: khru gang tsam 'og tu brkos la /
T02D2584:126a-0: dri zhim po'i chus gtor ba'i sas slar bkang @126a * //
T02D2584:126a-2: rdo rje rtse mos mngon par bsngags pa'i spos chus chag chag btab ste /
T02D2584:126a-3: kun tu brdungs la shin tu mnyam pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du chud pa //
T02D2584:126a-4: rta babs bzhis mdzes par byas pa /
T02D2584:126a-5: sgo bzhi dang skar khung can la sogs pas yongs su bskor la /
T02D2584:126a-6: mtha' ma rnams su legs par bris shing dril bu btags pa'i rgyal mtshan mang po gzugs pa dang /
T02D2584:126a-7: bla re dam pa bres pa dang /
T02D2584:126a-8: sangs rgyas rin po che la sogs pa'i ras ris nye bar mdzes par byas la //
T02D2584:126a-9: ba'i lci bas yang dag par sbyangs shing dris nye bar byug pa dang /
T02D2584:126a-10: mtshams bzhir spos khang bzhag la /
T02D2584:126a-11: me tog dang gos la sogs pas nye bar mdzes
T02D2584:126a-12: par byas la lag pa sa la bzhag ste h'um
T02D2584:126a-13: bzhi dang yi ge brgya pa lan bdun du bzlas
T02D2584:126a-14: par bya'o // de nas khrus dang dris byugs la gos dmar po'i stod g-yogs dang /
T02D2584:126a-16: me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing /
T02D2584:126a-17: gdong dri zhim pos byugs la gdu bu dang rna
T02D2584:126a-18: rgyan la sogs pas bdag nyid legs par brgyan te
T02D2584:126a-19: / zla ba nya nas brtsams te phyi ma'i bar du dkyil 'khor gyi las bya ba'am /
T02D2584:126a-20: yar gyi ngo'i tshes gcig nas brtsams pa'am //
T02D2584:126a-21: de bzhin du tshe brgyad dang /
T02D2584:126a-23: bcu gsum dang tshes bcu bzhi rnams nas brtsams la nya'i bar du'am /
T02D2584:126a-24: snga dro'i dus su brtsams par bya'o //
T02D2584:126a-25: de la dang po dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su gnas la /
T02D2584:126a-26: bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D2584:126a-27: sems dpa'i skyil krung du 'dug la /
T02D2584:126a-28: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung //
T02D2584:126a-29: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02D2584:126a-30: dam tshig ni phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs la snying po bzla ste /
T02D2584:126a-31: de ltar mchog tu dam tshig gsum thob pa'i slob
T02D2584:126a-32: dpon gyis rang gi phyag rgyas rdo rje dang dril
T02D2584:126a-33: bu bzung la / sems can thams cad la phan pa'i cho ga bya ste /
T02D2584:126a-34: rtog pa kun la yang dag 'jug dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jug pa ni //
T02D2584:126a-35: dam tshig chen po gsum bya'o //
T02D2584:126a-36: rgyal ba'i gsang sngags sgrub pa'o //
T02D2584:126a-37: dngos grub mchog ni thams cad kyis //
T02D2584:126a-38: rdo rje dril bu rab tu bskul //
T02D2584:126a-39: cho ga lhag gam ma tshang yang //
T02D2584:126b-0: de yang dang po sa'i @126b lha mo yi ge bam las byung ba /
T02D2584:126b-1: lag na bum pa thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bsams la //
T02D2584:126b-3: me tog la sogs pas mchod la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D2584:126b-4: de la phyag rgya dang sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D2584:126b-5: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rgyab sbyar la /
T02D2584:126b-6: mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis mdud pa bya ba ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2584:126b-7: sngags la takki h'um dza: dza: de nas 'dis bskul /
T02D2584:126b-8: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2584:126b-9: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par las //
T02D2584:126b-10: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02D2584:126b-11: lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur //
T02D2584:126b-12: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yis //

T02D2584:129b-37: ; zhes lan gnyis lan gsum brjod do //

T02D2584:130a-0: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs @130a
T02D2584:130a-2: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas //

T02D2584:130a-4: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //

T02D2584:130a-6: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D2584:130a-7: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la //

T02D2584:130a-10: sems can don yod tshul khrims dang //

T02D2584:130a-12: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2584:130a-13: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02D2584:130a-14: deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2584:130a-15: nam du yang ni mi gtong ngo //
T02D2584:130a-16: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D2584:130a-17: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang //
T02D2584:130a-18: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2584:130a-19: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2584:130a-20: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D2584:130a-21: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02D2584:130a-22: nyin re zhing yang lan drug tu //
T02D2584:130a-23: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02D2584:130a-24: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02D2584:130a-25: padma'i rigs mchog dam pa la //
T02D2584:130a-26: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02D2584:130a-27: dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2584:130a-28: las kyi rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D2584:130a-29: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02D2584:130a-30: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2584:130a-31: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02D2584:130a-32: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D2584:130a-33: bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung //
T02D2584:130a-34: ma brgal ba ni bsgral bar bgyi //
T02D2584:130a-35: ma grol bar ni dgrol bar bgyi //
T02D2584:130a-36: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbung zhing //
T02D2584:130a-37: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02D2584:130a-38: ces lan gnyis lan gsum du'o //
T02D2584:130a-40: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la //
T02D2584:130a-41: byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi //

T02D2584:130a-43: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

T02D2584:130a-48: sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir las grol //
T02D2584:130a-50: de nas chos bstan par bya ste /
T02D2584:130a-51: theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i //
T02D2584:130a-52: lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan //
T02D2584:130b-0: @130b khyed rnams der ni dong bas na //
T02D2584:130b-1: rang byung skal pa chen po pa //
T02D2584:130b-2: 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi //
T02D2584:130b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur //
T02D2584:130b-4: yod dang med las rnam par 'das //
T02D2584:130b-5: nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med //
T02D2584:130b-6: zab po rtog ge thams cad kyis //
T02D2584:130b-7: rab tu mi rtog gnas med de //
T02D2584:130b-8: spros pa kun dang bral ba ste //
T02D2584:130b-9: spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa //
T02D2584:130b-10: las dang bya ba sogs bral ba //
T02D2584:130b-11: bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi //
T02D2584:130b-12: theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di ni //
T02D2584:130b-13: tshul la gnas pa thob par 'gyur //
T02D2584:130b-14: de nas badzra ha sa ha zhes bya bas mngon
T02D2584:130b-15: par bsngags pa'i so shing gi rtse mor dris bskus
T02D2584:130b-16: shing me tog gis brgyan pa //
T02D2584:130b-17: shing mngar po 'o ma can las byung ba //
T02D2584:130b-18: tshad sor bcu gnyis pa 'cha' tu gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2584:130b-19: slob ma kha shar phyogs su bltas te /
T02D2584:130b-20: mi smra bar ni so shing 'cha'/
T02D2584:130b-21: 'cha' ba zin nas mi las shing //
T02D2584:130b-22: phan tshun du yang mi 'dor ro //
T02D2584:130b-23: so shing mdun du drang por dor //
T02D2584:130b-24: de tshe bdag la lta ba dang /
T02D2584:130b-25: rtse mi gyen du bsgreng gyur na //
T02D2584:130b-26: de ni dngos grub mchog ces bya //
T02D2584:130b-27: de bzhin shar du kha bltas na //
T02D2584:130b-28: de yi dngos grub 'bring du bshad //
T02D2584:130b-29: mtshams dang byang du kha bltas na /
T02D2584:130b-31: so shing bor ba brgya zhig la /
T02D2584:130b-32: gal te thur ru kha bltas na //
T02D2584:130b-33: de ni nges par sa 'og gi / dngos grub de la the tshom med //
T02D2584:130b-34: de nas nam zhes bya ba'i glu'i rdo rje yongs
T02D2584:130b-35: su bzlas pa'i chus 'thor 'thung bya ba'i phyir byin
T02D2584:130b-36: la / aom hr'i: bi shuddha shuddha sarba p'a pam ni ts'a sya sho dha ya //
T02D2584:130b-37: sarba bi kalpan aa pa na ya h'um zhes bya
T02D2584:130b-38: ba mngon par bzlas shing chu khyor ba gsum 'thung
T02D2584:130b-40: de nas ku sha gcig la /

T02D2584:130b-42: bzlas la byin la 'di lta mgo bo'i sngas su
T02D2584:130b-44: yang ku sha gzhan dag la rdo rje gnod spyin
T02D2584:130b-45: gyi gsangs sngags mngon par bzlas pas stan du bya
T02D2584:130b-47: rdo rje gnod sbyin mngon par bzlas pa'i srung skud
T02D2584:130b-48: mdud pa gsum dang ldan pa la yang yi ge

T02D2584:130b-51: aom badzra yaksha zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags so //

T02D2584:131a-2: manydzu shr'i tve no pa tishtha dridho me bha ba /

T02D2584:131a-4: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D2584:131a-5: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D2584:131a-8: tsittam shri ya: ku ru h'um /
T02D2584:131a-10: bha ga w'a na sarba ta th'a ga ta badzr'a

T02D2584:131a-12: sa ma ya manydzu shr'i a'a: zhes bya ba ni
T02D2584:131a-13: yi ge brgya ba'i sngags so //
T02D2584:131a-14: de nas bzhin bzangs rnams longs shig / sang gi
T02D2584:131a-15: nyin mo khyed rnams thar pa chen po'i rang bzhin
T02D2584:131a-16: gyi grong khyer mthong bar 'gyur gyis /
T02D2584:131a-17: ji ltar mthong ba'i rmi lam rnams kyang smros shig ces brjod la slar btang ngo //
T02D2584:131a-18: de nas nang par mtshan mo'i mthar rmi lam gang dag mthong bar dri bar bya'o //
T02D2584:131a-19: rmi lam mthong nas rmi lam bzang po'am ngan pa 'dzem pa med par brjod par bya'o //
T02D2584:131a-20: rmi lam sangs rgyas mthong ba ni //
T02D2584:131a-21: yon tan rgya mtsho mngon sum bzhin //
T02D2584:131a-22: mchod rten dang ni sku gzugs mthong //
T02D2584:131a-23: de la mchod pa rtsom pa dang //
T02D2584:131a-24: dge slong dag las chos nyan tam //
T02D2584:131a-25: yang na gzhan las nyan kyang rung //
T02D2584:131a-26: chos ni rnam par spyod pa dang /
T02D2584:131a-27: de bzhin glegs bam glog pa dang /
T02D2584:131a-28: rmi lam dge 'dun mthong ba dang /
T02D2584:131a-29: yang na dge slong gcig tu mthong //
T02D2584:131a-30: de dang 'grogs shing gtam zer dang //
T02D2584:131a-31: yang na dge slong dngos por mthong //
T02D2584:131a-32: gtsug lag khang dag mthong ba dang //
T02D2584:131a-33: de bzhin dge slong ma dag mthong //
T02D2584:131a-34: rgyal ba'i sras rnams mthong ba dang //
T02D2584:131a-35: de bzhin pha ma bla ma dang //
T02D2584:131a-36: mdza' bo rnams pa sna tshogs rnams //
T02D2584:131a-37: rmi lam du ni mthong na shis //
T02D2584:131a-38: rig sngags dang ni dngos grub thob //
T02D2584:131a-39: de bzhin bslab pa 'dzin pa dang //
T02D2584:131a-40: kun dga' rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
T02D2584:131a-41: 'bab chu rnams dang rgya mtsho dang //

T02D2584:131a-45: bde gshegs spyod dang mthun pa yi //
T02D2584:131a-46: dga' thub can dang bram ze dang //
T02D2584:131a-47: phyug po skyes bu dam pa dang //
T02D2584:131a-48: ba dang rta dang ngang pa dang //
T02D2584:131a-49: seng ge dang ni ri dgas dang //
T02D2584:131a-50: rmi lam du ni mthong na shis //
T02D2584:131a-51: bkra shis pa yi bya rnams //
T02D2584:131a-52: gser dag dang ni gter rnams dang //
T02D2584:131a-53: rin po che dang dngul dag dang //
T02D2584:131a-54: nor ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
T02D2584:131a-55: mdor na 'byung khungs rnam pa dang //
T02D2584:131a-56: mtshon cha rnams dang 'bru rnams dang //
T02D2584:131b-0: 'bras bu @131b rnams dang me tog dang /
T02D2584:131b-1: rgyan gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
T02D2584:131b-2: kha zas dang ni gos rnams dang //
T02D2584:131b-3: byis pa dang ni gzhon nu ma //
T02D2584:131b-4: bud med gzugs ni bzang mo dag / rmi lam du ni mthong na bzang //
T02D2584:131b-5: yang na thob cing reg smra dang //
T02D2584:131b-6: rmi lam du ni dbang bskur dang //
T02D2584:131b-8: dmag dpon du ni gyur pa dang //
T02D2584:131b-9: g-yul las rgyal zhing dgra gsod dang //
T02D2584:131b-10: gnyen dang lhan cig 'grogs pa dang //
T02D2584:131b-11: lha rnams kyang ni mthong ba dang //
T02D2584:131b-12: theg pa dang ni shing rta zhon //
T02D2584:131b-13: de bzhin ri dang khang thogs 'dzegs //
T02D2584:131b-14: ngo mtshar rnam pa sna tshogs dag / rmi lam du ni mthong na dge //
T02D2584:131b-15: yam shing me la sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2584:131b-16: bya ba bzang po dag la 'jug / chu las brgal zhing ro las brgal //
T02D2584:131b-17: rkun po dag ni tshar gcod dang //
T02D2584:131b-18: stobs 'gyed pa las rgyal ba dang /
T02D2584:131b-19: gyad stobs rdo bcing 'gying ba dang //
T02D2584:131b-20: rtsed mo sna tshogs rmi ba dang //
T02D2584:131b-21: de bzhin rtsal dang stobs 'gyed dang //
T02D2584:131b-22: bkra shis dag ni thams cad dang //
T02D2584:131b-23: mthong na rab tu dge bar bshad //
T02D2584:131b-24: gsang sngags cho ga nyan pa dang //
T02D2584:131b-25: dga' ston dge ba mthong ba dang /
T02D2584:131b-26: sgrub pa bzang po rtsom pa dang /
T02D2584:131b-27: de la sogs pa'i ltas rnams ni //
T02D2584:131b-28: dge ba rnam pa du ma dag / blo yis rnam par dpyad bya zhing //
T02D2584:131b-29: de las bzlog pa spang bar bya //
T02D2584:131b-31: mi dge rnams ni mi 'grub po //
T02D2584:131b-32: mi dge ba dag shes nas su //
T02D2584:131b-33: de dag mkhas pas spang bar bya //
T02D2584:131b-34: dge ba yi ni ltas rnams ni //
T02D2584:131b-35: rab dang 'bring dang tha ma las /
T02D2584:131b-36: gsang sngags dngos grub rnam gsum mo //
T02D2584:131b-37: mi dge ba la zhi ba yi //
T02D2584:131b-38: sbyin sreg zhi ba'i gsang sngags kyis //
T02D2584:131b-39: ba yi mar la brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02D2584:131b-40: cho ga bzhin du zhi ba dang /
T02D2584:131b-41: de nas slob ma sdig bral zhing //
T02D2584:131b-42: rnam par dag pa de dag la //
T02D2584:131b-43: rjes su brtse bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2584:131b-44: ci 'dod par ni gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2584:131b-45: de nas dkyil 'khor yang dag par mchod la bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa ji ltar bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2584:131b-46: de nas bdug spos gtul la /
T02D2584:131b-47: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D2584:131b-48: sras bcas 'jig rten rnam grangs dang //
T02D2584:131b-49: rdo rje rigs chen rigs dag dang //
T02D2584:131b-50: de bzhin padma las kyi rigs //
T02D2584:132a-0: snying po sngags dang rigs rnams @132a * //
T02D2584:132a-2: gang yang lha yi tshogs rnams kun //
T02D2584:132a-3: chos kyi dbyings na nges bzhugs pa //
T02D2584:132a-4: de rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02D2584:132a-5: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02D2584:132a-6: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:132a-7: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
T02D2584:132a-8: yo byad ci 'byor pa yis ni //
T02D2584:132a-9: chos dbyings rang bzhin grong khyer mchog / dkyil 'khor sang ni bri bar bgyi //
T02D2584:132a-10: thugs brtse nye bar bzhag nas ni //
T02D2584:132a-11: byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol //
T02D2584:132a-12: de nas rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya dag gis 'khor lo bteg la /
T02D2584:132a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams nyid dang ba'i shel
T02D2584:132a-14: lta bu'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang du zhugs par
T02D2584:132a-15: kha sbyar ba ni 'di yin te /
T02D2584:132a-16: aom h'um hr'am hr'i: zhes bya ba'i dbus su steng
T02D2584:132a-17: dang 'og dang bar du bkra shis par bya ba'i
T02D2584:132a-19: yang steng du a'a: lnga dang /
T02D2584:132a-21: de ltar bdag dang dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2584:132a-22: de nas de nyid du slob ma'i gtso bo dang
T02D2584:132a-23: lhan cig bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag pa'i blo
T02D2584:132a-25: de yan chad ni slob ma lhag phar gnas pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D2584:132a-26: de nas nang par skya rengs shar tsam na khrus
T02D2584:132a-27: bya ba sngon du 'gro ba nas lha'i rnal 'byor
T02D2584:132a-28: byas la / nyi ma shar kar thig gdab pa brtsam par bya ste /
T02D2584:132a-29: 'khor los sgyur ba'i nga rgyal bya la srad bu
T02D2584:132a-30: sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang
T02D2584:132a-31: gu dang dkar po dang dri zhim pos kha bsgyur
T02D2584:132a-32: la go rims 'di nyid kyis bzhag la /
T02D2584:132a-33: h'um hr'am hr'i: aa: aom zhes bya ba'i sa bon
T02D2584:132a-34: las mi bskyod pa la sogs pa srad bu la
T02D2584:132a-35: bkod de / sa bon de rnams la rang rang
T02D2584:132a-36: gi phyogs na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D2584:132a-37: kyi thugs kar rang rang gi kha dog ji ltar
T02D2584:132a-38: 'od kyi srad bur bsams la mig gnyis su aom
T02D2584:132a-39: d'ipta drisht'a aam ku shi dza: zhes bkod la rab
T02D2584:132a-40: tu g-yo zhing 'bar ba'i rdzi ma'i lcags kyus drang
T02D2584:132a-41: bkod de / bar bsam / bcom ldan 'das dkyil
T02D2584:132a-42: 'khor chen po'i thig gdab pa'i phyir rdo rje'i thig
T02D2584:132a-43: bdag la stsol cig ces bskul bar bya'o //
T02D2584:132a-44: bdag po rnams kyis btang ba'i 'od zer gyis rang rang gi srad bur gang bar bsam mo //
T02D2584:132a-45: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta sarba dha rm'a:
T02D2584:132a-46: spha ra spha ra aa nu pra bishta sarba dha
T02D2584:132b-0: rm'a:/ aa tyanta aa nu pra @132b bishta sarba dharm'a:/
T02D2584:132b-1: aom badzra satva h'um zhes zlos shing bsgril bar bsam mo //
T02D2584:132b-2: de nas ma dang ta las nyi ma dang zla
T02D2584:132b-3: ba ser po snang ba mig gnyis su bskyed la
T02D2584:132b-4: / badzra tishtha ma ta zhes bya bas brtan par byas nas /
T02D2584:132b-5: gser la sogs pa'i snod du srad bu bzhag dri dang me tog pa sogs pas mchod la /
T02D2584:132b-6: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra
T02D2584:132b-7: ma h'um zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bsdams pas bzung
T02D2584:132b-8: la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2584:132b-9: ring thung ni dkyil 'khor gyi nyis ldab bo //
T02D2584:132b-10: phra sbom ni sgo'i nyi shu cha'o //
T02D2584:132b-11: de nas dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya ste /
T02D2584:132b-12: slob dpon shar du bltas slob ma nub tu bltas la /
T02D2584:132b-13: lag pa gnyis kyi rdo rje khu tshur gyis srad
T02D2584:132b-14: bu lte ba nas bzung la dza: zhes brjod la
T02D2584:132b-15: // g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis grogs mchog la gtang bar bya'o //
T02D2584:132b-16: grogs pos kyang dza: gsum gyis blang bar bya'o //
T02D2584:132b-17: de nas 'debs kar 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
T02D2584:132b-18: nam mkha' gang ba'i bde gshegs rnams //
T02D2584:132b-19: thig gi sgra yis bskul nas ni //
T02D2584:132b-20: thams cad 'dir ni gshegs su gsol //
T02D2584:132b-21: khyed kyis 'gro don mdzad pa'i rigs //
T02D2584:132b-22: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes brjod de //
T02D2584:132b-23: ji ltar gzhan nas gsungs pa ltar gdab par bya'o //
T02D2584:132b-24: de yang rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ni dbus
T02D2584:132b-25: su phur bu btsugs la de la srad bu btags
T02D2584:132b-26: te / dbus la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa /
T02D2584:132b-27: de'i phyir rim rtsibs bcu drug pa 'de'i phyi rim du rgyan med pa'i sgo gzhug ste /
T02D2584:132b-28: rtsig pa'i cha dang 'dod yon dang /
T02D2584:132b-29: dra ba phyed pas brgyan pa'o //
T02D2584:132b-30: rta babs la sogs pa rgyan gzhan ni med par gdab bo //
T02D2584:132b-31: de'i phyi rol du rdo rje phreng bas bskor la /
T02D2584:132b-32: 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug par gdab po //
T02D2584:132b-33: de'i phyi rol du phreng bas bskor la /
