T02D2584:132b-34: gru chad bzhi yis brgyan te lha snam med pa'i go dang thig gdab po //
T02D2584:132b-35: de la rgyan la sogs pa thams cad kyis brgyan par gdab bo //
T02D2584:132b-37: 'khor lo rim gsum ldan pa la //
T02D2584:132b-38: snam bu mu khyud rnams kyis brgyan //
T02D2584:132b-39: rta babs dang ni tva ra na /
T02D2584:132b-40: shin tu mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D2584:132b-42: de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2584:132b-43: de ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi thig bstan nas /
T02D2584:133a-1: thig 'debs na thams cad kyi dbus 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa /
T02D2584:133a-4: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par gdab po //
T02D2584:133a-5: de nas rigs bsdus pa'i thig 'debs na dbus 'khor
T02D2584:133a-6: lo rtsibs bzhi po brang dang bcas par gdab po
T02D2584:133a-7: // slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal nas /
T02D2584:133a-8: pho brang thig bzhi btab pas le tshe dgu ru yod pa la //
T02D2584:133a-9: rdo rje'i gdung bzhi btang la phyogs bzhi dbus dang
T02D2584:133a-10: lngar de bzhin gshegs pa lnga 'khor dang bcas pa'i
T02D2584:133a-11: pho brang lnga bya gsung ngo //
T02D2584:133a-13: de nas mdun du mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor //
T02D2584:133a-14: g-yas su rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor /
T02D2584:133a-15: rgyab tu snang ba mtha' yas kyi dkyil 'khor /
T02D2584:133a-16: g-yon du don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab po //
T02D2584:133a-18: nang gi dkyil 'khor te dag kyang gru bzhi pa //
T02D2584:133a-21: phyi'i dkyil 'khor la ni rta babs la sogs pa thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D2584:133a-22: dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad kyi phyi rol du
T02D2584:133a-23: khor yug dang khor yug chen po'i thig gdab par
T02D2584:133a-24: bya'o // de dag ni thig gdab pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D2584:133a-25: de nas dkyil 'khor de la gal te 'gran zhing
T02D2584:133a-26: gegs byed na de bzlog pa'i cho ga ni nam
T02D2584:133a-27: mkha' dri med las shes par bya'o //
T02D2584:133a-28: de nas tshon dgye ba brtsam par bya ste /
T02D2584:133a-29: srad bu la bshad pa'i kha dog gi rim pas tshon rtsi rnams blangs la /
T02D2584:133a-30: h'um tr'am hr'i: aa: aom zhes bya ba 'di rnams las bskyed de //
T02D2584:133a-31: rang gi rigs kyi 'khor bsams la /
T02D2584:133a-32: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um /
T02D2584:133a-33: zhes bya ba 'di dag phyag rgya dang bcas pas stong rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2584:133a-34: de la 'di'i phyag rgya 'di yin te /
T02D2584:133a-35: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis ka yi //
T02D2584:133a-36: mdzub mo rtse mor rab sbyar nas //
T02D2584:133a-37: byas nas tshon rtsi thams cad la //
T02D2584:133a-38: 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya //
T02D2584:133a-39: mthar yi ge hr'i: dang rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgyas spar bar bya'o //
T02D2584:133a-40: de yang 'bar ba'i lta ba ni 'di yin te /
T02D2584:133a-41: rab tu myur bar g-yo ba'i mig / mig gi rdzi ma 'dren ma ni //
T02D2584:133a-42: 'bar ba'i lta ba zhes su gsungs //
T02D2584:133b-0: de la tshon mang por bya ba'i phyir bden pa'i byin @133b gyis brlab par byas te /
T02D2584:133b-1: bden pa gang gis sems can rnams la sangs rgyas
T02D2584:133b-2: rnams sems can rjes su dga' bas chags par mdzad
T02D2584:133b-3: pa'i bden pa des tshon rtsi 'bar bar gyur cig
T02D2584:133b-4: ces bya'o // de nas dbus kyi phur bu h'um bzhis phyung la /
T02D2584:133b-5: bu ga tshon sna lngas dgang ste /
T02D2584:133b-6: de nas tshon dkar po blangs la //
T02D2584:133b-7: aom badzra raksha sa ma ya h'um zhes brjod de dbus su bkye la /
T02D2584:133b-8: de nas dbang ldan phyogs su song ste /
T02D2584:133b-9: g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyi rim par mnyam
T02D2584:133b-10: zhing rgyun ma chad par mdzub gang bar drang la
T02D2584:133b-11: des tshon rtsi bde bar bri bar bya'o //
T02D2584:133b-12: de yang drug stong ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i le'u dgu pa nas /
T02D2584:133b-13: rdo rje 'chang che pos 'di skad gsung te /
T02D2584:133b-14: kye ma 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02D2584:133b-15: brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor rdul tshon ni //
T02D2584:133b-16: rin chen lnga las grub pa ste /
T02D2584:133b-17: dbus kyi pho brang le tse rnams //
T02D2584:133b-18: shar phyogs bee d'urya las grub //
T02D2584:133b-19: lhor ni gser las grub pa ste /
T02D2584:133b-21: byang ni aindra n'i la ste /
T02D2584:133b-22: dbus ni dung las grub pa'o / zhes gsungs te /
T02D2584:133b-25: 'byor ba tha mas ni rin po che gser gyi
T02D2584:133b-26: sa gzhi la byin gyis brlabs te bri bar bya'o
T02D2584:133b-27: // de yang cho ga bsdus pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa //
T02D2584:133b-28: shar phyogs su ni sngon po ste //
T02D2584:133b-29: lho ni ser po yin par nges //
T02D2584:133b-30: nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste //
T02D2584:133b-31: byang du ljang gu yang dag bri //
T02D2584:133b-32: dbus kyi lte ba dkar po ste //
T02D2584:133b-33: gong ras rnams kyang de ka ltar //
T02D2584:133b-34: re mig rnams ni ljang gu ste //
T02D2584:133b-35: de yi phyi rgyab 'khor lo ni //
T02D2584:133b-38: gru chad ljang gu mtsho dang bcas //
T02D2584:133b-39: panytsa rin chen pha gu lnga //
T02D2584:133b-40: dkar dang ljang dang dmar dang ser //
T02D2584:133b-41: sngon po phyi yi rtse mo la'o /
T02D2584:133b-42: sgo ni phyogs kyi mdog dang sbyar //
T02D2584:133b-43: phyi rol 'khor lo bcu drug ni //
T02D2584:133b-46: phyi yi rtsig pa lnga po yang //
T02D2584:133b-47: pha gu lnga yi rim pa bzhin //
T02D2584:133b-48: khyams ni padma r'a ga'i mdog //
T02D2584:133b-49: dra ba'i rang bzhin mthong ga la /
T02D2584:133b-51: bkra shis bya yi tshogs kyis brgyan //
T02D2584:133b-52: rta babs la sogs ci mdzes par //
T02D2584:134a-0: @134a * // mkhas pas ji ltar 'tsham par bri //
T02D2584:134a-1: de ni tshon gyi rim pa ste //
T02D2584:134a-2: mi shes drang phyir kun rdzob bstan //
T02D2584:134a-3: don gyi ngo bo brjod du med //
T02D2584:134a-5: de la dpyad de bri ba ni //
T02D2584:134a-6: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshon no //
T02D2584:134a-7: de nas kha phral ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshon dgye na /
T02D2584:134a-9: dbus ni 'khor lo rdo rje dang /
T02D2584:134a-10: padma rin chen rgya gram mtshan //
T02D2584:134a-11: le tshe dgu la ka ba brgyad //
T02D2584:134a-12: thams cad la ni rab tu gsungs //
T02D2584:134a-13: rnam par snang mdzad dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D2584:134a-14: dbus dkar re mig ljang gu la //
T02D2584:134a-15: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dkar po dgye //
T02D2584:134a-16: rtsibs mchan rnams ni dkar po ste //
T02D2584:134a-17: rdo rje phreng dkar gzhi ma ser //
T02D2584:134a-18: shar sngo lho ni ser po la /
T02D2584:134a-19: nub ni dmar byang ljang gu'o //
T02D2584:134a-20: rtsig pa dkar nas rim par dgye //
T02D2584:134a-21: khyams la sogs pa spyi dang mthun //
T02D2584:134a-22: mi bskyod pa yi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D2584:134a-23: dbus na sngo phreng dkar po la //
T02D2584:134a-24: 'khor lo sngon po re mig ljang //
T02D2584:134a-25: rtsibs mchan rnams ni dmar po gtang //
T02D2584:134a-26: rdo rje phreng nag gzhi ma dkar //
T02D2584:134a-27: shar dkar lho ni ser po la //
T02D2584:134a-28: nub dmar byang ni ljang gu'o //
T02D2584:134a-29: rtsig pa sngo nas rim pas dgye //
T02D2584:134a-30: khyams la sogs pa spyi dang mthun //
T02D2584:134a-32: dbus dmar phreng ba dkar po la /
T02D2584:134a-33: 'khor lo dmar la re mig ljang //
T02D2584:134a-34: rtsibs mchan rnams ni dkar por bya //
T02D2584:134a-35: rdo rje'i phreng ljang gzhi ma ser //
T02D2584:134a-36: shar sngo lho no ser po la /
T02D2584:134a-37: nub dkar byang ni ljang gu ste //
T02D2584:134a-38: rtsig pa dmar nas rim pas dgye //
T02D2584:134a-40: dbus ser phreng ba sngon po la /
T02D2584:134a-41: 'khor lo ser la re mig ljang //
T02D2584:134a-42: rtsibs mchan rnams ni sngon po la //
T02D2584:134a-43: rdo rje phreng dmar gzhi ma ljang //
T02D2584:134a-44: shar sngo lho ni ser po la /
T02D2584:134a-45: nub dmar byang ni ljang gu ste //
T02D2584:134a-46: rtsig pa ser nas rim pas dgye //
T02D2584:134a-47: don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D2584:134a-48: dbus ljang phreng ba dmar po la //
T02D2584:134a-49: 'khor lo ljang la re mig ser //
T02D2584:134a-50: rtsibs mchan rnams ni ser po ste //
T02D2584:134a-51: rdo rje phreng sngo gzhi ma ser //
T02D2584:134a-52: shar sngo lho ni ser po la //
T02D2584:134a-53: nub dmar byang ni dkar po ste /
T02D2584:134a-54: rtsig pa ljang nas rnam par dgye //
T02D2584:134b-0: zhes pa ni khri drug stong pa'i @134b rgyud phyi ma nas gsungs so //
T02D2584:134b-1: khyams la sogs pa ni thams cad la ma thun no //
T02D2584:134b-2: de nas rigs bsdus pa'i rdul tshon dgye na /
T02D2584:134b-3: dbus ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ltar //
T02D2584:134b-4: lhag ma ni rang rang gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'o //
T02D2584:134b-5: phyi'i rgyan ni spyi dang mthun no //
T02D2584:134b-6: khor yug dang khor yug chen po ni dmar po
T02D2584:134b-7: dang dkar po byas la rdo rje ser po dang
T02D2584:134b-9: de yan cad ni rdul tshon bri ba'i rim pa'o //
T02D2584:134b-10: de nas phyi rol du dri zhim pos nye bar byugs la /
T02D2584:134b-11: me tig gi sil ma gtor te /
T02D2584:134b-12: yi ge brgya pa bzlas pa'i chus dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02D2584:134b-13: phyi dang nang du bcas pa kun la bsang gtor bya'o //
T02D2584:134b-14: de nas dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la //
T02D2584:134b-15: aom badzra tsakra h'um zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2584:134b-16: de nas phyi dro'i dus su glu dang rol mo
T02D2584:134b-17: dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis
T02D2584:134b-18: dang po'i 'khor lo ji snyed dang ci 'dod pa
T02D2584:134b-19: bzhin du mchod cing brtag par bya'o //
T02D2584:134b-20: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i dam tshig
T02D2584:134b-21: sems dpa'i sku gzugs lugs ma la sogs pa la
T02D2584:134b-22: sa ma ya stvam zhes gnas su bzhugs su gsol
T02D2584:134b-23: lo // de nas yi ge phyin ci ma log
T02D2584:134b-24: par kha sbyor gyi sbyor ba gsal bar snang la
T02D2584:134b-26: aom h'um hr'i: zhes pa'i snying pos bzhugs su gsol //
T02D2584:134b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po yin pa'i phyir thams cad kyi thun mong yin no //
T02D2584:134b-28: de la phyag rgya bzhi'i don dang ldan par bya'o //
T02D2584:134b-29: de la mchod pa rnams kyis mchod la /
T02D2584:134b-30: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod ces pa la sogs pas bstod de /
T02D2584:134b-32: de nas rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i bum
T02D2584:134b-33: pa rnams mgon po 'jam dpal gyi spyan sngar gzhag
T02D2584:134b-34: par bya'o // bum pa gzhan dag kyang mi bskyod
T02D2584:134b-35: pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa'i dkyil
T02D2584:134b-37: aom badzro da ka h'um zhes brgya rtsa bzlas la
T02D2584:134b-38: gos sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa 'bum ma ma khri
T02D2584:134b-39: 'am stong ngam brgya'am rigs so so la re re
T02D2584:134b-40: gzhag go // spyi la de bzhin du dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2584:134b-41: de nas dkyil 'khor bas ha can mi ring mi
T02D2584:134b-42: nye bar bkur sti gus pa sngon du 'gro bas
T02D2584:135a-0: shar phyogs su yum shes rab @135a * //
T02D2584:135a-1: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya //
T02D2584:135a-2: lhor ni rin po che tog / nub tu sdong pos brgyan pa //
T02D2584:135a-3: byang du zla ba sgron ma'i mdo bklag par bya'o //
T02D2584:135a-4: gar mkhan dang rol mo la sogs pa'i ltad mo mang po yang phyogs bzhir byed du gzhug go //
T02D2584:135a-5: zur bzhi dar gyi rgyal mtshan bzhi yang bsgreng bar bya'o //
T02D2584:135a-6: me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D2584:135a-7: dkar gsum dang mngar gsum dang khur ba la sogs
T02D2584:135a-8: pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba la sogs pa rnam
T02D2584:135a-9: pa mang po yang ci rigs pa dgod par bya'o
T02D2584:135a-11: ba dan drug dang rnga mas brgyan //
T02D2584:135a-12: dril bu dar mtshon rgyal mtshan sogs //
T02D2584:135a-13: de la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams ni //
T02D2584:135a-14: shin tu mdzes par brgyan pa'o //
T02D2584:135a-15: zhes pa la sogs rgyan mchog ni //
T02D2584:135a-16: 'di yi skabs su rim pas bstan //
T02D2584:135a-17: zhes gsungs pa de la 'di skad ces bya'o //
T02D2584:135a-18: de yan chad ni brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa'o//
T02D2584:135a-19: de nas dgongs mo'i dus su sngags pa khrus byas //
T02D2584:135a-20: rgyan cha bgo / lus la dri zhim pos byugs nas g-yas pas rdo rje thogs la /
T02D2584:135a-21: g-yon pas dril bu dkrol zhing //
T02D2584:135a-22: mtshang ba'i lhag ma kha bskang ba'i phyir lan bdun
T02D2584:135a-23: nam lda 'am gsum du yi ge brgya pa bzla
T02D2584:135a-25: de nas bde ba'i stan la nye bar 'dug ste /
T02D2584:135a-26: lce lag byin gyis brlab pa nas bzung la /
T02D2584:135a-27: sbyor ba dang po dang dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang /
T02D2584:135a-30: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa yan chad byas la /
T02D2584:135a-31: de nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa lnga dang /
T02D2584:135a-33: de bzhin gzhan dag gis mchod de //
T02D2584:135a-34: de bzhin du mchod pa nyi shus kyang yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2584:135a-35: de nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /
T02D2584:135a-36: ba dan sna tshogs pa rnam par bkra ba brgya stong la sogs pa'i grangs snyed dam /
T02D2584:135a-37: 'byor pa ci yod pa las 'bul ba dang ro brgya ba'i lha'i zhal zas dang /
T02D2584:135a-38: svasti ka la sogs pa'i bza' ba sna tshogs pa
T02D2584:135a-39: 'bum mam brgya stong snyed du dbul bar bya ste
T02D2584:135a-40: / aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am aa'dya nutpanna tv'ata ces brjod la dbul bar bya'o//
T02D2584:135a-41: rol mo bcu phrag stong ngam //
T02D2584:135b-0: @135b bcu aom h'um hr'i: zhes pa mngon par bzlas la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2584:135b-1: rnam pa bcu ni 'di lta ste /
T02D2584:135b-2: gling bu dang pi wang dang /
T02D2584:135b-8: rnga rings dang rnga rked nyag dang gi mi la zhes bya ba dang bcu'o //
T02D2584:135b-10: stong ngam brgya dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2584:135b-11: shin tu brtags pa'i rta dang glang po che dang /
T02D2584:135b-12: ba lang gi khyu rnams kyang /
T02D2584:135b-13: aom badzra spha ra na kham zhes bya ba mngon par bzlas la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2584:135b-14: de nas sbyin sreg gis las phran tshegs kyi dngos grub sgrub par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2584:135b-15: gzhan yang sbyin sreg byed pa na //
T02D2584:135b-16: las bshad de dag gzhan du med //
T02D2584:135b-18: gzhan gong du gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum
T02D2584:135b-19: gyi don bsgom pas 'og nas 'byung ba'i sbyin sreg
T02D2584:135b-20: 'di yang bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2584:135b-21: las bshad ces pa ni las ni bdag dang gzhan gyi'o //
T02D2584:135b-22: bshad pa ni sgrub thabs 'di ru'o //
T02D2584:135b-24: don gzhan dang mi bsre par 'og nas 'byung ba'o //
T02D2584:135b-25: bdag gi las dang gzhan gyi las //
T02D2584:135b-27: de la dang po la bdag don dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2584:135b-28: de la bdag gi las bstan pa //
T02D2584:135b-30: bdag gi las la yang bzhi ste /
T02D2584:135b-31: de yang phyi dang nang du snang ba'i rnam par
T02D2584:135b-32: rtog pa sbyang zhing zhi bar bya ba'i phyir na
T02D2584:135b-33: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg dang tshe dang bsod nams rgyas
T02D2584:135b-34: par bya ba'i phyir rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg dang /
T02D2584:135b-35: bsam pa yid dang 'thad pa thams cad dbang du bya ba'i phyir dbang gi sbyin sreg dang /
T02D2584:135b-36: phas kyi rgol ba ngan pa dang /
T02D2584:135b-37: sbyor ba ngan pa thams cad rgyun gcad par bya ba'i phyir drag po'i mngon spyod dang bzhi'o //
T02D2584:135b-38: de nas de'i yam shing la sogs pa bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:135b-39: shin tu dge ba'i shing bu ni //
T02D2584:135b-40: zhes gsungs pa ni zhi ba la dge ba ste /
T02D2584:135b-41: dkar po la 'o ma can mngar ba'i ro dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2584:135b-42: rgyal pa la dge ba ste ser po kha ba'i ro dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2584:135b-44: dmar ba skyur ba'i ro dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2584:135b-45: mngon spyod la dge ba ste /
T02D2584:135b-46: nag po tsher ma can gyi shing tsha zhing rtsub
T02D2584:135b-47: ba'i ro dang ldan pas bya zhes pa'i don to
T02D2584:135b-48: // de'i ngo bo gang yin zhe na /
T02D2584:136a-0: de bstan pa'i phyir tsandan shug pa zhes pa ni @136a * //
T02D2584:136a-2: sogs zhes pa'i khongs su rgyas pa la skyer pa /
T02D2584:136a-3: dbang la padma dmar po'i shing /
T02D2584:136a-4: mngon spyod la gang zhig tsher ma can gyi shing la bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2584:136a-5: dri zhim dang ldan mdzes pa'i shing //
T02D2584:136a-7: zhi la kha dog dkar po mngar ba'i ro yis byug pa'o //
T02D2584:136a-8: dbang la kha dog dmar po ro skyur bas byug pa'o //
T02D2584:136a-9: rgyas pa la kha dog ser po ro kha bas byug pa'o //
T02D2584:136a-10: mngon spyod la kha dog nag por bya zhing ro
T02D2584:136a-11: tsha zhing rtsub pas byug go zhes pa'i don to
T02D2584:136a-12: // de nas shing gi ring thung gi tshad bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:136a-13: zlum po la sogs dbyibs su brtsig / ces gsungs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02D2584:136a-14: zhi ba'i thab khung ni kha dog dkar po dbyibs zlum po che chung ni khru gang du bya'o //
T02D2584:136a-15: zabs su khru phyed brkos la /
T02D2584:136a-16: kha khyer sor bzhis bskor bar bya ste /
T02D2584:136a-17: dbus kyi kha khyer la rdo rje phreng ba gtang ngo //
T02D2584:136a-18: de'i phyi rol du 'khor lo gtang ngo //
T02D2584:136a-19: de nas rgyas pa'i thab khung ni kha dog ser po //
T02D2584:136a-21: khru bzhi pa khru gang zabs su brko /
T02D2584:136a-22: kha la sor bzhi bcu yod pas gru bzhir bskor ro //
T02D2584:136a-23: dbus kyi kha khyer la rin po che'i phreng ba btang //
T02D2584:136a-24: nang du padma'i 'bras bu phyi rol gyi sor bzhi la padmas bskor bar bya'o //
T02D2584:136a-25: de nas dbang gi thab khung ni dbyibs zla gam la /
T02D2584:136a-26: zla gam gyi kha la sor nyi shu tham pa yod pa //
T02D2584:136a-27: rgyal sor bzhi bcu yod pa //
T02D2584:136a-28: zabs su sor bcu bskor bar bya ste /
T02D2584:136a-30: kha khyer la sor gsum gyis bskor //
T02D2584:136a-31: dbus kyi kha khyer la mda' gzhu dang lcags kyu btang //
T02D2584:136a-32: de'i phyi rol du zhags pas brgyan pa'o //
T02D2584:136a-33: de nas mngon spyod kyi thab khung ni kha dog nag po /
T02D2584:136a-35: ngos re la sor nyi shu'o //
T02D2584:136a-37: sor gsum phyir bkyed la kha khyer sor gsum gyis bskor //
T02D2584:136a-38: dbus kyi kha khyer la rdo rje rtse gsum pas bskor /
T02D2584:136a-39: de'i phyi rgyab tu mda' gzhu dang /
T02D2584:136a-40: mdung rtse gsum pa dang dgra sta dang kha tv'am ga spel la gtang ngo //
T02D2584:136a-41: de la rang rang gi mtshan ma yang bri'o //
T02D2584:136a-42: de nas me spar ba ni zhi ba'i me ni dgon pa'am //
T02D2584:136a-43: 'on te gtsub shing las bton la dngul la sogs
T02D2584:136b-0: pa'i snod dkar po'i nang du rlung yab kyis @136b
T02D2584:136b-1: sbar la / legs par 'bar ba dang /
T02D2584:136b-2: gzod bud shing gi nang du blugs so //
T02D2584:136b-3: rgyas pa'i me ni rgyal po'am //
T02D2584:136b-4: 'on te bu mang po'i khyim nas blangs te /
T02D2584:136b-5: gser ram ser po'i snod sar par sbar ro //
T02D2584:136b-6: dbang gi me ni smad 'tshong ma'i khyim nas blangs la zangs kyi kong bu sar par sbar ro //
T02D2584:136b-7: mngon spyod kyi me ni shan pa nag po'i khyim
T02D2584:136b-8: nas blangs la lcags kong sar pa'i nang du rlung
T02D2584:136b-11: gzod bud shing gi nang du blugs so //
T02D2584:136b-12: de nas aom badzra dzva la dzva la h'um zhes
T02D2584:136b-13: brjod cing mar gyi dgang blugs gsum gyis me gso
T02D2584:136b-14: bar bya'o // de nas thab khung de bsangs la /
T02D2584:136b-15: dam tshig gi me lha bskyed par bya ba'i phyir thab khung du me tog gtor la /
T02D2584:136b-16: pam las sna tshogs padma'i gdan bskyed la //
T02D2584:136b-18: dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom par bya //
T02D2584:136b-20: dbu la ye shes sems dpas brgyan //
T02D2584:136b-21: zhes pa'i bar ni dkyus nyid gsal lo //
T02D2584:136b-22: de nas ye shes kyi me lha shar lho mtshams nas spyan drang ste /
T02D2584:136b-23: dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis //
T02D2584:136b-24: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs 'byung po che //
T02D2584:136b-25: me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog / sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes nas kyang //
T02D2584:136b-26: 'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol //
T02D2584:136b-27: aagna ye ram ram pra be sha ya phat /
T02D2584:136b-28: a'a be sha ya aa: zhes dam tshig dang gnyis su med par bstim mo //
T02D2584:136b-29: de la mchod pas mchod nas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D2584:136b-30: de nas dam tshig gi me lha'i thugs kar lha tshogs bskyed de //
T02D2584:136b-31: de yi thugs kar aa las zla stengs su //
T02D2584:136b-33: sku gsung thugs dang ldan par bsam //
T02D2584:136b-34: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te go sla'o //
T02D2584:136b-35: de nas rdzas kyi rim pa bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:136b-36: de la sreg blugs dbul ba ni /
T02D2584:136b-37: zhes gsungs pa ni gong du bskyed pa'i lha tshogs
T02D2584:136b-38: de la 'og nas 'byung ba'i rdzas rnams dbul bar
T02D2584:136b-40: mar dang til dang yam shing dang //
T02D2584:136b-41: mngar gsum lde gu dkar gsum ni //
T02D2584:136b-42: zhi ba'i rdzas la bshad pa'o //
T02D2584:136b-43: zhes gsungs pa ni zhi ba'i rdzas so //
T02D2584:136b-44: rgyas dang dbang dang drag po dgug / de las gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams ni //
T02D2584:137a-2: / rgyas par bstan te der shes bya //
T02D2584:137a-3: zhes gsungs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02D2584:137a-11: gro chan rnams bsog go zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2584:137a-12: de yang kha dog dang ro dang yam shing gi skabs su gsungs pa ltar 'dir yang ngo //
T02D2584:137a-13: rdzas thams cad ni rnal 'byor pa'i g-yas su bsgrig par bya'o //
T02D2584:137a-14: mchod rdzas thams cad ni g-yon du bsgrig par bya'o //
T02D2584:137a-15: de nas dgang gzar blugs gzar kha sbyar zhing dbul ba ni zhi ba la mar //
T02D2584:137a-17: dbang la me tog autpa la /
T02D2584:137a-18: mngon spyod la tsher ma dbul te sna drang ba'o //
T02D2584:137a-19: dbul ba ni sngags rings kyi zhabs la //
T02D2584:137a-20: aom sarba p'a pam sh'antim ku ru ye sdig pa la sogs pa zhi bar gyur zhig sv'a h'a //
T02D2584:137a-21: pushtim ku ru ye tshe dang bsod nams rgyas par gyur zhig sv'a h'a /
T02D2584:137a-22: pa sham ku ru ye thams cad dbang du gyur cig sv'a h'a //
T02D2584:137a-23: m'a ra ya phat thams cad brlag par gyis shig
T02D2584:137a-24: / a'a karsha ya thams cad khugs par gyur zhig
T02D2584:137a-25: h'um dza: zhes brjod cing sreg rdzas rnams rim par
T02D2584:137a-26: dbul bar bya'o // de nas spyi bor yi ge
T02D2584:137a-27: aa dkar po cig bsams la de'i 'od zer gyis
T02D2584:137a-28: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D2584:137a-32: zhe sdang la sogs pa rnams la phog pas ye
T02D2584:137a-33: shes kyi chus bkrus nas yang dag pa'i ye shes
T02D2584:137a-35: bkug nas bzhi po'i aa la thim pas 'od du zhu ste /
T02D2584:137a-36: lus mgo gzhug tu thim pas bag chags kyi lus sbyangs te /
T02D2584:137a-37: slar gsos nas mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan par gyur te /
T02D2584:137a-38: yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo bde la
T02D2584:137a-39: mi rtog pa de la lhag par gnas pas lhag
T02D2584:137a-41: de nas rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin spyi bo'i aa
T02D2584:137a-42: las 'od zer ser po 'phros pas tshangs pa la
T02D2584:137a-43: sogs pa'i yang tshe bcud bsdus nas bdag gi tshe'i
T02D2584:137a-44: gnas su thim zhing rgyas par bya'o //
T02D2584:137a-45: longs spyod 'phel bar 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D2584:137a-46: khengs pa'i nor phyugs bkug cing rang gi nor phyugs
T02D2584:137a-47: la bstims te rgyas par bya'o //
T02D2584:137b-0: bu tsha 'phel bar 'dod tshangs @137b ris man chad kyi pho'i mtshan kun bkug ste /
T02D2584:137b-1: pho mo'i skye gnas la bstims pas bu tsha 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2584:137b-2: de nas dbang gi ting nge 'dzin ni yang aa
T02D2584:137b-3: las 'od dmar po 'phros pas gang dbang du bya
T02D2584:137b-4: ba de 'os zer gyis bkug ste /
T02D2584:137b-5: bag gi mdun du mngon sum du 'ongs shing dbang
T02D2584:137b-6: du 'dus par bsams na rgyal po'i btsun mo lta
T02D2584:137b-7: bu yang dbang du 'dus par 'gyur ro //
T02D2584:137b-8: de nas drag po mngon spyod kyi ting nge 'dzin
T02D2584:137b-9: ni aa de las 'od zer nag po 'phros pas
T02D2584:137b-10: bdag gis dgra bgegs la sogs pa'i gdug pa can
T02D2584:137b-11: rnams bkug ste bsgral nas phung po mchod yon du
T02D2584:137b-12: phul te brlag par bsam pa de'i phyir //
T02D2584:137b-13: spyi bo zla stengs aa bsgoms la //
T02D2584:137b-14: de nyid zhu bar gyur pa las //
T02D2584:137b-15: zhi bya de nyid zhu 'gyur te //
T02D2584:137b-16: slar gsos gzhon nu'i gzugs byas la //
T02D2584:137b-17: de la lhag par gnas par bya //
T02D2584:137b-18: zhes de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2584:137b-19: de yan cad ni bdag gi don gyi rim pa'o //
T02D2584:137b-20: de nas na ba la phan gdags pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:137b-21: de la na ba'i las bya ba //
T02D2584:137b-22: zhes bya ba ni gang zhig 'og nas 'byung ba 'di rnams yin no zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2584:137b-23: gang dag yid ni mi dran pa'i //
T02D2584:137b-28: bgegs kyi sbyor ba yod gyur na ;
T02D2584:137b-29: / zhes pa ni bgegs kyi rgyal po ba n'i
T02D2584:137b-30: ya ka la sogs pa bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad
T02D2584:137b-31: cu rtsa bzhi'o // sbyor ba ni rims dang shu ba dang g-yan pa dang /
T02D2584:137b-32: mdze la sogs pa yod na /
T02D2584:137b-36: zhes pa ni bdag stong ba'i ngang las yi ge dha'i: dkar po cig tu bsams la /
T02D2584:137b-37: de yongs su gyur pa las dang po'i sangs rgyas
T02D2584:137b-38: de'i thugs kar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nya
T02D2584:137b-39: gang ba lta bu de'i steng du gzhi'i snying po
T02D2584:137b-40: mum dang / spro byed kyi snying po ram bsam //
T02D2584:137b-41: ram de las 'od 'phros pas nad la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad dang /
T02D2584:137b-42: de gtong bar byed pa'i bgegs dang /
T02D2584:137b-43: de'i rkyen la sogs pa rnams shin tu 'od zer
T02D2584:137b-44: gyis bzhu btul byas la slar nad la thim pas
T02D2584:137b-45: nang kyi dngos po thams cad zhu bar byas te
T02D2584:137b-46: slar 'dus pa las 'bru nag po las bgegs kyi
T02D2584:138a-1: gnod pa'i ming shog bu la bris te /
T02D2584:138a-2: glan la de la nad kyi dngos po bstims la /
T02D2584:138a-3: thim pa dang gzod zhi ba'i skabs su ji ltar gsungs pa ltar me sbar te /
T02D2584:138a-4: sngags rings zhabs la bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu
T02D2584:138a-5: dang nang bzhi brgya rta bzhi zhi bar 'gyur cig
T02D2584:138a-6: sv'a h'a zhes bzlas te yungs kar dang /
T02D2584:138a-7: til nag gis brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg par byas na sos par 'gyur ba'i phyir //
T02D2584:138a-8: dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom bya ste //
T02D2584:138a-10: yungs kar brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg / ces pa'i bar du gsungs so //
T02D2584:138a-11: gal te sems par ma gyur na //
T02D2584:138a-12: srin bus zos pa'i shing gdug pa can khru gang
T02D2584:138a-13: pa la tsha ba gsum gyis bskus te de la
T02D2584:138a-14: me spar la gong ma lta bur bgegs dang nad
T02D2584:138a-15: dgug gzhug byas la bsreg par bya ste /
T02D2584:138a-16: lhag ma ni dkyus gsal lo //
T02D2584:138a-17: na ba la phan gdags pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D2584:138a-18: de nas shi ba la phan gdags pa bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:138a-19: de nas shi la phan gdags na //
T02D2584:138a-22: dang po gnod pa'i bgegs bsal te //
T02D2584:138a-24: rigs kyi bu pho mo don dang ldan pa gang rung cig tshe'i 'du byed du gyur na /
T02D2584:138a-25: phung po de drod dang ma bral bar bdag dang
T02D2584:138a-26: po'i sangs rgyas kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas ro
T02D2584:138a-27: la gnod pa'i bgegs la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin
T02D2584:138a-28: gyis bkug la // sha chang dang sgog btsong dang /
T02D2584:138a-31: khur ba la sogs pa'i gtor ma cha gcig gis
T02D2584:138a-32: byin gyis brlabs la bdud rtsi sbyin pa'i sngags kyis
T02D2584:138a-33: byin la rdo rje'i tshig tu 'di skad brjod //
T02D2584:138a-34: su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na //
T02D2584:138a-35: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang //
T02D2584:138a-36: gshin rje srin po gang yang rung //
T02D2584:138a-37: sngon gyi lan chags ded pa rnams //
T02D2584:138a-38: mthun pa'i gtor ma 'di long la //
T02D2584:138a-39: tshe 'das 'di la ma mnar cig / ces byas la gtang ngo //
T02D2584:138a-40: de nas yungs kar gyi rgyal pos bra ba cing sngags rings bzlas la mtshams bcad do //
T02D2584:138a-41: de ni phyi rol la phan pa'i cho ga zhes pa'o //
T02D2584:138a-42: de nas ro de'i spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2584:138a-43: gyi steng du yi ge aa dkar po cig bsams
T02D2584:138a-44: la de 'od du zhu ba las lus thams cad
T02D2584:138a-46: spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga lte ba smon mtshams dang ldar rim par rnam snang dang /
T02D2584:138b-1: don thams cad grub pa dang /
T02D2584:138b-2: rin chen 'byung ldan rnams 'khor dang bcas par gyur par bsam //
T02D2584:138b-3: lha re re'i spyi bo na yang aa dkar po re re yod par bsam pa de'i phyir //
T02D2584:138b-4: aa yis kun khyab spyi steng bsam //
T02D2584:138b-5: lhar gyur lha ni sngon bzhin bsam //
T02D2584:138b-7: de nas rang rang gi spyi bo'i aa las 'od
T02D2584:138b-8: 'phros pas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
T02D2584:138b-9: shes kyi bcud bsdus te kha dog lnga dang ldan
T02D2584:138b-10: par byas te / rang rang gi spyi bor thim
T02D2584:138b-11: pa las de bzhin gshegs pa lnga lnga'i dbu rgyan
T02D2584:138b-13: lus thams cad ye shes lda'i ngo bor gnas pa'o //
T02D2584:138b-15: aa las ye shes lngas gang nas //
T02D2584:138b-17: phan pa'i gnod spyin chus btab la //
T02D2584:138b-18: zhes pa ni chu gtsang la aom badzra yaksha h'um zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
T02D2584:138b-19: phung po lnga'i rnam par rtog pa sbyang ba'i phyir
T02D2584:138b-20: sngon du gsungs pa'i lha tshogs la sku khrus gsol
T02D2584:138b-22: dang po bkru ba las yin te //
T02D2584:138b-25: zhes pa ni bdag gi thugs kar aa dkar po bsam /
T02D2584:138b-26: de las 'od zer 'phros pas 'gro drug gi bag zhags sbyangs //
T02D2584:138b-27: che las 'das pa'i shes pa bkug la /
T02D2584:138b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcad pa la thim par bsam mo //
T02D2584:138b-30: de ni sngon gyi cho ga'o zhes pa ni de
T02D2584:138b-31: ltar gong du gsungs nas ni ro'i sngon du 'gro
T02D2584:138b-32: ba'i cho ga yin no zhes pa'o //
T02D2584:138b-33: de nas zhes pa ni gong du 'gro ba byas
T02D2584:138b-34: pa'i de ma thag pa nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i
T02D2584:138b-35: lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga 'di bshad do zhes
T02D2584:138b-36: pa'i don to // shi ba dkyil 'khor dbus bzhag ste //
T02D2584:138b-37: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2584:138b-38: dang ldan pa'i ro de mandala gyi dbus su sna
T02D2584:138b-39: tshogs padma'i gdan la gzhag go //
T02D2584:138b-40: zhag gsum slob dpon smyung gnas pa //
T02D2584:138b-42: zhag sum kha zas kyi tshod bzung la //
T02D2584:138b-43: dkar gsum la sogs pa bza' zhing / nyin re
T02D2584:138b-44: la thun gsum gsum lha'i rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o
T02D2584:138b-46: bgegs bskrad la sogs byas nas ni //
T02D2584:138b-48: thun re re la lho sgo'i cho ga re re la'o //
T02D2584:138b-50: sems can kun gyi ngan song gsum //
T02D2584:139a-3: ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba //
T02D2584:139a-4: mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog / ces gsungs so //
T02D2584:139a-5: 'khor lo lha rnams mdun bsam ste //
T02D2584:139a-6: zhes pa ni de ltar zhag gsum du byas pa'i nang par 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2584:139a-7: aom manydzu shr'i badzra tsakra h'um zhes brjod pas dkyil
T02D2584:139a-8: 'khor gyi lha rnams mdun gyi nam mkha' la bsams
T02D2584:139a-9: la // de la mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:139a-10: phyag btsal rdo rje bskyed sogs bya //
T02D2584:139a-11: zhes pa bcu yongs su dag pa dang sdom pa
T02D2584:139a-12: gzung bar byas la de nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i
T02D2584:139a-15: 'di la dbang ni stsal du gsol //
T02D2584:139a-16: zhes pa yan chad brjod par bya'o //
T02D2584:139a-17: de nas sbyor ba dang po dang dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang /
T02D2584:139a-18: las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bya'o //
T02D2584:139a-19: de nas sgo dbye ba bya ste /
T02D2584:139a-20: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02D2584:139a-21: mdzub mo gnyis ni rab tu brkyang //
T02D2584:139a-22: mthe chung lu gu rgyud du sbrel //
T02D2584:139a-23: sgo dbye ba yi phyag rgya ste //
T02D2584:139a-24: aom manydzu shr'i badzra dha ronggha ta ya h'um phat ces brjod de //
T02D2584:139a-25: gzhal yas khang sgo dbye bar bya'o //
T02D2584:139a-26: de nas rdo rjer sgrub pa dang /
T02D2584:139a-27: tshogs bsags pa yan chad 'dir shes par bya'o //
T02D2584:139a-28: de nas sngags rigs kyis lha thams cad gsal bar byas la /
T02D2584:139a-29: thun gsum gyi rnal 'byor zhag bzhi ru bya'o //
T02D2584:139a-30: de nas gang zhig de nyid la //
T02D2584:139a-32: shi ba sta gon la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2584:139a-33: to zhes pa yan chad kyis don la gnas par
T02D2584:139a-34: byas te / dkyus nyid gsal lo //
T02D2584:139a-37: / dang po sangs rgyas nga rgyal dang //
T02D2584:139a-39: mngon sum 'dra bar gang bar bsgom //
T02D2584:139a-40: zhes pa'i bar gyis gsol ba gdab pa ste /
T02D2584:139a-42: de nas bri ba bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:139a-43: shi la phan gdags dkyil 'khor ldan //
T02D2584:139a-45: de'i don ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor lta
T02D2584:139a-46: bu la dbus kyi pho brang me thab tu byas
T02D2584:139a-47: la // gzhal yas khang pa de 'dra ba /
T02D2584:139a-48: zhes pa ro sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor yin no zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2584:139a-49: 'di las gsungs te gzhan du zhes pa ni gong
T02D2584:139a-50: du gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor te lta bu ni ro
T02D2584:139a-51: sbyong ba'i don du yin gyi dbang bskur ba la
T02D2584:139b-0: @139b sogs pa'i don du ni ma yin no zhes
T02D2584:139b-1: pa'i don to // zhag bdun nang par sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2584:139b-3: de ltar rol bsnyen pa zhag bdun du byas nas
T02D2584:139b-4: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa'i tshe sbyin sreg
T02D2584:139b-6: de yang ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02D2584:139b-7: de nas phyi yi rim ldan pas //
T02D2584:139b-9: phyi'i rim ldan ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du bgegs bskrad pa dang /
T02D2584:139b-10: gar la sogs pa'i rol mos mchod pa dang phung
T02D2584:139b-11: po la sogs pa drang bar bya'o zhes pa'i don
T02D2584:139b-12: to // de yang ji ltar zhe na /
T02D2584:139b-13: sngags pa chas gos ldan pa yis //
T02D2584:139b-14: shin tu bsgyings pa ldan byas te //
T02D2584:139b-16: chas gos ldan pa ni dbu rgyan dang /
T02D2584:139b-27: ldan pa ni de rnams 'dzom pa'o ;
T02D2584:139b-28: / bsgyings pa ni shin tu 'gying bag dang bas
T02D2584:139b-29: pas dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' ma bskor bar bya zhes
T02D2584:139b-30: pa'i don to // de nas sngon gyi sbyor ba yis//
T02D2584:139b-31: cho ga rnams ni dpyad par bya //
T02D2584:139b-32: dang po'i cho ga'i rim pa nas //
T02D2584:139b-35: lce lag byin gyis brlab pa nas /
T02D2584:139b-36: gzhal yas khang bskyed pa yan chad bya ste /
T02D2584:139b-37: de nas gzod ro de me thab tu bzhag ste //
T02D2584:139b-40: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa yan cad byas te /
T02D2584:139b-42: de yang ji ltar sbar zhe na /
T02D2584:139b-43: sngon du zhi ba'i skabs su ji ltar 'dir yang
T02D2584:139b-44: rgyas par byas la gzod bsreg pa'i las byas te
T02D2584:139b-46: ro mchod gnas su bsreg pa dang /
T02D2584:139b-48: ro sreg rdzas su bsreg pa dang gsum du shes par byas la bsreg go //
T02D2584:139b-49: rdzas dbul la sogs pa'i rim pa sngon du shes par bya'o //
T02D2584:139b-51: me nyid shi ba'i gnas sbyangs te //
T02D2584:139b-53: de nas khrus byas mchod pa'i tshogs //
T02D2584:139b-55: mchod pa'i yo byad rnams la rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi chus bsangs la /
T02D2584:139b-56: me tog la sogs pa lnga dang lha mo brgyad dang /
T02D2584:140a-2: mchod pa nyi shu bas kyang mchod pa //
T02D2584:140a-3: bstod pa rnams kyis bstod do //
T02D2584:140a-5: ma lus par ni 'dir bshad do //
T02D2584:140a-7: de nas dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las gsungs pa ltar phyogs skyong la gtor ma sbyin no //
T02D2584:140a-8: de nas de la lam bstan bya //
T02D2584:140a-9: tshogs bsag dge ba'i don la sbyar //
T02D2584:140a-10: zhes pa'i don ni lho sgro'i cho ga las zhes par bya'o //
T02D2584:140a-11: de mthar bdag nyid rtogs sgom dang //
T02D2584:140a-12: zhes pa ni de ltar byas pa'i rjes la bdag nyid me dmigs par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2584:140a-13: de nyid mnyam shes pa ni bdag nyid yang dag pa'i thugs dang //
T02D2584:140a-14: tshe las 'das pa'i shes pa gnyis mnyam zhing dbyer med par shes par bya'o zhes ba'i don to //
T02D2584:140a-15: cis mi tshugs zhes pa ni de ltar rtogs na
T02D2584:140a-16: nyon mongs pa gang gis kyang mi tshugs so zhes
T02D2584:140a-17: pa'i don to // de la rtag gnas bde ldan dang /
T02D2584:140a-19: thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi don de la rtag
T02D2584:140a-20: par gnas na yang dag pa'i ye shes phyin ci
T02D2584:140a-21: ma log pa'i don bde ba dang ldan no zhes
T02D2584:140a-22: pa'i don to // de ltar bsgom pa'i don bstan
T02D2584:140a-23: nas skabs 'dir ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol
T02D2584:140a-24: ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D2584:140a-25: sngon du bsnyen pa'i skabs su ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2584:140a-26: de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bsdu ba ni rim pas /
T02D2584:140a-27: aa'i dang nyid du zhes gsungs te /
T02D2584:140a-28: rim pa ni ye shes kyi rdo rje mchod rten la thim /
T02D2584:140a-30: rdo rje rgya gram la de gzhal yas khang la /
T02D2584:140a-33: de dang po'i sangs rgyas la //
T02D2584:140a-35: de ye shes sems dpa' la /
T02D2584:140a-38: de nyid la aa'i dang nyid du //
T02D2584:140a-40: de ltar bdag gi ngo bo yi ge aa dkar po'i dang nyid du gnas pas ;
T02D2584:140a-41: de yang bdag lus aas khyab pa'o //
T02D2584:140a-43: de nas aa de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag gi
T02D2584:140a-44: shes pa 'og du zhu nas thig le byang chub
T02D2584:140a-45: kyi sems skye ba med pa'i dang du rtogs te
T02D2584:140a-46: / nye ba'i dpes mtshon na 'dus ma byas pa'i nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gnas te /
T02D2584:140b-1: de nyid aa yi byin rlabs la //
T02D2584:140b-2: aa nyid dbyings kyi dang nyid du //
T02D2584:140b-5: de nas ji ltar gsungs pa'i don gyi rnal 'byor ba'o //
T02D2584:140b-6: de yan cad shi ba la phan gdags pa'i rim pa'o /
T02D2584:140b-8: // / de nas 'khor lo rnam pa bzhi'i don bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:140b-9: de nas 'khor lo bstan pa zhes pa'i don ni 'og nas 'byung ba 'di nyid yin no //
T02D2584:140b-11: bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can //
T02D2584:140b-12: yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das //
T02D2584:140b-13: bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can //
T02D2584:140b-15: lus la 'khor lo bzhi gnas te //
T02D2584:140b-16: lte ba shes rab 'khor lo ste //
T02D2584:140b-17: rtsibs ni bcu gnyis yang dag ldan //
T02D2584:140b-18: dang po'i rtsibs nas brtsams te dgod pa ni //
T02D2584:140b-19: aa a'a aam a'a: aa a'a aam a'a: aa a'a aam a'a: gnas so //
T02D2584:140b-20: rtag pa shes rab yig 'bru'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D2584:140b-21: pho brang lha'i 'khor lo ni lte ba la mi bskyod pa //
T02D2584:140b-22: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' //
T02D2584:140b-23: rgyal po chags pa legs pa /
T02D2584:140b-24: sems ma rdo rje ma sgeg mo dang /
T02D2584:140b-28: spos kyi glang po ye shes tog dang bcu gnyis so //
T02D2584:140b-29: lte bar shes rab 'khor lo grags //
T02D2584:140b-30: snying gar shes rab 'khor lo ni bcu gnyis rtsi bas dang ldan pa la /
T02D2584:140b-31: rim pa bzhin du dang por aa gdod /
T02D2584:140b-38: rtag pa shes rab yig 'bru'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D2584:140b-39: pho brang lha'i 'khor lo ni lte bar rin chen 'byung ldan //
T02D2584:140b-51: spobs pa brtsegs pa dang bcu gnyis so //
T02D2584:140b-52: 'di ni snying ga'i sher rab 'khor lo'o //
T02D2584:140b-53: mgrin pa shes rab 'khor lo ni //
T02D2584:140b-54: bcu gnyis rtsibs dang yang dag ldan //
T02D2584:140b-55: rim bzhin rtsibs gcig pa la aa /
T02D2584:140b-57: w'a ga'i shva ra pra dzny'a na ma: dgod //
T02D2584:140b-58: rtag pa shes rab yig 'bru'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D2584:140b-60: lte ba la snang ba mtha' yas //
T02D2584:141a-4: sgo ba lcags sgrog / mthu chen thob dang /
T02D2584:141a-7: dra ba can gyi 'od dang bcu gnyis so //
T02D2584:141a-8: mgrin pa shes rab 'khor lor grags //
T02D2584:141a-9: spyi bo shes rab 'khor lo ni //
T02D2584:141a-10: bcu gnyis rtsibs dang yang dag ldan //
T02D2584:141a-11: rtsibs dang por ha ra ha ra /
T02D2584:141a-13: aom h'um hr'i: bha ga w'an dzny'a na m'u rti /
T02D2584:141a-14: b'a g'i shva ra ma h'a w'a tsa sarba dha
T02D2584:141a-15: rma ga ga n'a ma la su pa ri shuddha
T02D2584:141a-16: dha rma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a: rtag pa
T02D2584:141a-18: pho brang lha'i 'khor lo ni lte ba la don yod grub pa /
T02D2584:141a-29: mtshog ma shes rab 'khor lor grags //
T02D2584:141a-30: ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal //
T02D2584:141a-31: zhes pa bzhu btul ni 'khor lo'i gdams ngag bla ma las shes par bya'o //
T02D2584:141a-32: de ni pho brang lha'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D2584:141a-34: lhag pa shes rab kyi 'khor lo dang gsum gsal bar bstan to //
T02D2584:141a-35: de ltar bsgoms pas 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:141a-36: de ltar rtag tu gang bsgom pa //
T02D2584:141a-38: rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig gis de ltar
T02D2584:141a-39: bsgoms na 'og nas 'byung ba'i gzhon nu'i gzugs can
T02D2584:141a-40: bde ba thob ces gsungs pa ste /
T02D2584:141a-42: gzugs can ni de'i sku la mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D2584:141a-43: bde ba thob pa ni de'i thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes thob pa'o //
T02D2584:141a-45: de dag spangs nas zhes pa ni //
T02D2584:141a-46: gong du gsungs pa'i don de ltar bsgoms pas khams
T02D2584:141a-47: gsum gyi nyon mongs pa spangs nas 'og nas 'byung
T02D2584:141a-48: ba'i gzhan gyi don phyin ci ma log pa yang
T02D2584:141a-49: grub ste / rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs su skye bas na //
T02D2584:141a-50: rang dga'i lus su skye bar nges //
T02D2584:141a-53: des sa bcu la bgrod par bstan pa ni //
T02D2584:141a-55: de ni shes rab 'khor lo bsgom pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D2584:141a-56: de nas lhag par gnas pa'i slob ma de dbang bskur bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2584:141b-0: @141b 'di ni dbang bskur dam par gsungs //
T02D2584:141b-2: sngon du lhag par gnas pa'i slob ma de 'dir dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2584:141b-3: de ma bskur na cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2584:141b-4: dbang bskur med na dngos grub med //
T02D2584:141b-6: de nas slob dpon gyis bya ba'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2584:141b-7: yon tan ldan pa'i sngags pa zhes gsungs te /
T02D2584:141b-8: yon tan ldan pa'i slob ma dbang bskur ba'i sngon
T02D2584:141b-9: du slob dpon nyid kyis ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil
T02D2584:141b-11: dbang blang ba la sogs pa byas la /
T02D2584:141b-12: gzod slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2584:141b-14: de la dbang byin yon tan grub //
T02D2584:141b-16: de nas slob ma gzhug par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2584:141b-17: dang po khrus byas rgyan gon te /
T02D2584:141b-18: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa'i don ni 'di
T02D2584:141b-19: yin te slob dpon du 'os pa'i bla mas las
T02D2584:141b-20: thams cad pa'i chus bsangs la rdo rje sems dpar
T02D2584:141b-22: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan la /
T02D2584:141b-23: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i gos dmar po'i stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs gyon la /
T02D2584:141b-24: aom badzra t'i kashna h'um phat ces bzlas pa'i gdong g-yogs dmar po bcings la /
T02D2584:141b-25: yon gyi dam pa dag phul ba yongs su blangs te ;
T02D2584:141b-29: spyi bo rnams su rdo rje dang /
T02D2584:141b-32: sna tshogs rdo rje zla ba'i steng du de'i sa
T02D2584:141b-33: bon gyi rnam par bkod la phyogs bzhi'i de bzhin
T02D2584:141b-34: gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byed du bcug la
T02D2584:141b-35: / de nas sa ma ya stvam zhes pa'i sngags
T02D2584:141b-36: kyis 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya
T02D2584:141b-37: 'dzin du gzhug cing de bzhin du phreng ba 'dzin
T02D2584:141b-38: / du gzhug go // de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces bsgo ba bya ste /
T02D2584:141b-39: skal dang ldan pa rigs kyi bu //
T02D2584:141b-40: khyod ni ci dang ci la dga' //
T02D2584:141b-41: 'dod don gang yin khyod kyis smros //
T02D2584:141b-42: de nas slob mas 'di skad ces //
T02D2584:141b-43: bdag ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02D2584:141b-44: rab tu blta bar bgyi ba dang //
T02D2584:141b-45: mya ngan 'das pa'i grong mchog tu //
T02D2584:141b-47: de rjes slob dpon dam pas kyang //
T02D2584:141b-48: 'di skad ces ni brjod par bya //
T02D2584:142a-2: gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba'i //
T02D2584:142a-4: bdag gis bu khyod gzhug par bgyi //
T02D2584:142a-5: grong khyer la yang grong khyer de //
T02D2584:142a-6: mya ngan 'das pa'i grong mchog tu //
T02D2584:142a-7: bu khyod rab tu gnas par bgyi //
T02D2584:142a-10: lha rnams la yang phyag 'tshol la //
T02D2584:142a-11: sdig pa ma lus sbyang byas nas //
T02D2584:142a-12: sdom pa rnams ni legs par zung //
T02D2584:142a-13: mchog tu sems kyang bskyed par gyis //
T02D2584:142a-15: de nas don dang ldan pa'i slob ma 'khor dang bcas pas /
T02D2584:142a-16: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la phyag byas la /
T02D2584:142a-17: bcu yongs su dag pa nas sdom pa gzung ba yan chad byed du gzhug go //
T02D2584:142a-19: ding khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis /
T02D2584:142a-20: ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs
T02D2584:142a-21: pa thams cad grub pa yang thob na gzhan lta
T02D2584:142a-23: de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par byas kyis //
T02D2584:142a-24: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams
T02D2584:142a-25: la ma smra shig / dam tshig nyam par gyur
T02D2584:142a-26: ta re / de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag
T02D2584:142a-27: rgya kha thur du bstan pa slob ma'i spyi bor
T02D2584:142a-28: bzhag la 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
T02D2584:142a-29: 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje dam tshig gis gal
T02D2584:142a-30: te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par
T02D2584:142a-31: 'gyur ro // de nas dam tshig phyag rgya 'di
T02D2584:142a-32: nyid dang mna' chu'i snying pos sngags la slob mas
T02D2584:142a-34: de'i mna'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02D2584:142a-35: h'um rdo rje dam tshig deng khyod nyid //
T02D2584:142a-36: snying la yang dag zhugs mdzad kyis //
T02D2584:142a-37: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02D2584:142a-38: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02D2584:142a-39: aom badzra au da ka tha:/
T02D2584:142a-40: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02D2584:142a-41: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02D2584:142a-42: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni //
T02D2584:142a-44: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams //
T02D2584:142a-45: gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras //
T02D2584:142a-47: dad pa med la bstan mi bya //
T02D2584:142a-48: de nas slob ma la 'di skad bsgo'o //
T02D2584:142a-49: deng phan chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis //
T02D2584:142a-50: ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de yang bya dgos so //
T02D2584:142a-51: khyod kyis pa la brnyas par ma byed cig /
T02D2584:142b-0: mi bde @142b pa ma spangs pas khyod dus byas
T02D2584:142b-1: nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras
T02D2584:142b-2: la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2584:142b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur zhes smos shig par bsgo'o //
T02D2584:142b-5: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur ba nyid
T02D2584:142b-6: du rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di
T02D2584:142b-7: skad brjod do // 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig ste //
T02D2584:142b-8: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
T02D2584:142b-9: rdo rje ye shes bla na med //
T02D2584:142b-10: de ring nyid du 'bab par shog / aom badzra a'a be sha aa: zhes brjod do //
T02D2584:142b-11: de nas phyag rgya bcings pa las byung nas de'i
T02D2584:142b-12: snying gar zhugs te rdo rje sems dpa' 'bab par
T02D2584:142b-13: gyur par bsams na 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02D2584:142b-14: yang ho aa ha zhes bya ba yang rang gi snying ga la bkod la /
T02D2584:142b-15: se'u'i me tog dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2584:142b-16: rang gi dam tshig dang bcas pa rang gi snying
T02D2584:142b-18: badzra bandha trat ces pas de'i snying ga phye la
T02D2584:142b-19: der bcug ste rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcings
T02D2584:142b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bar gyur par bsams na dang 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02D2584:142b-22: theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rdo rje'i
T02D2584:142b-23: tshig gis bdun nam brgyad rdzogs pas kyang 'bab par
T02D2584:142b-24: 'gyur ro // slob ma'i gtso bo'i snying gar rdo rje bya //
T02D2584:142b-25: yig brgya phyed pas mnyam gzhag brtan byas nas //
T02D2584:142b-26: bdag lus gang yin snod kyi sgo phye zhing //
T02D2584:142b-27: snying la gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su blta //
T02D2584:142b-28: sngags kyi bdag po yi ge aa dmar gsungs //
T02D2584:142b-29: brjod pas dang dag chags pas g-yo bar blta //
T02D2584:142b-30: slob ma'i lus 'di sgo ni dbye byas par //
T02D2584:142b-31: zhugs nas rdo rje byas pa'i snying la gnas //
T02D2584:142b-32: ma lus lus pa kun du bkang nas su //
T02D2584:142b-33: rkang pa g-yon pas g-yas pa mnan nas ni //
T02D2584:142b-34: sngags pas slob ma'i snying ga de la dbab //
T02D2584:142b-35: kun du dril bu'i sgra ni yang dag dkrol //
T02D2584:142b-36: lag pa padma 'dab ma'i phyag rgya byas //
T02D2584:142b-37: mi bskyod rin chen la sogs bde gshegs rnams //
T02D2584:142b-38: rang gi phyogs phyogs nas byon 'od phab pas //
T02D2584:142b-39: legs babs gyur pas rang gi bu la blta //
T02D2584:142b-40: gang zhig des kyang 'bab par ma gyur na //
T02D2584:142b-41: lag pa g-yas par til gyi sa bon gzhag //
T02D2584:142b-42: dbus su yi ge h'um yang rnam bkod de //
T02D2584:143a-0: @143a * // rdo rje 'od 'bar ba ni rnam par bsam //
T02D2584:143a-1: g-yon pa'i mtheb mdzub phyag rgyar byas pa yis //
T02D2584:143a-2: blang bar byas la me la sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2584:143a-3: lus ni thal bar byas la rnam dag pa'i //
T02D2584:143a-4: bsod nams lus la'ang sngags kyi 'od kyis dang //
T02D2584:143a-5: ye shes bab ba nyid du bsams nas ni //
T02D2584:143a-6: rdzas bzhin 'bab pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur //
T02D2584:143a-7: la la dag gis legs par bshad pa na //
T02D2584:143a-8: mche a'i myu gu cung zad gtsogs pa yis //
T02D2584:143a-9: rtse mo 'od dkar g-yo zhing dgod pa'i zhal //
T02D2584:143a-10: smin ma gdengs pas phyogs bcu ma lus pa //
T02D2584:143a-11: 'brug sgra lta bu h'um ni 'jigs pa'i sgra //
T02D2584:143a-12: sangs rgyas me tog chun phreng gnyis btags pa //
T02D2584:143a-13: 'od chen sna tshogs ldan par rang gi lus bsgoms la //
T02D2584:143a-14: sngags par rang gi bu yi mig phye ste //
T02D2584:143a-15: 'khor lo 'di dag ma lus bstan par bya //
T02D2584:143a-16: gang tshe der ni ci yang ma mthong na //
T02D2584:143a-17: rang las byung ba'i 'od kyi phreng ba yis //
T02D2584:143a-18: de yi snying la snang bar byas la de nas ni //
T02D2584:143a-19: 'di ni nyis 'gyur mig tu 'gyur bar bsam //
T02D2584:143a-20: de yi 'od kyis mig gnyis bskul bas na //
T02D2584:143a-21: de tshe cung zad nges par mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D2584:143a-22: des kyang de bzhin mtshan ma ma mthong na //
T02D2584:143a-23: rjes mthun gnas pas bden pa'i byin rlabs bya //
T02D2584:143a-24: 'gro ba'i don la chags bral ma mdzad ces //
T02D2584:143a-25: brtul zhugs can gyis der sogs kyis bskul zhing //
T02D2584:143a-26: bus mo gnyis ka sa la btsugs nas ni //
T02D2584:143a-27: gzugs mthong phyir ni mchod pa dbul bar bya //
T02D2584:143a-29: babs ma thag tu lha'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur zhing //
T02D2584:143a-30: ye shes des ni pha rol sems su 'gyur ro //
T02D2584:143a-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher sbyar ro //
T02D2584:143a-32: de nas tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas de'i snying ga'i phyag rgya dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2584:143a-33: tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bden pa'i byin rlabs brjod par bya'o /'di ltar bdag gi slob ma 'di //
T02D2584:143a-34: dkyil 'khor du ni legs bcug nas //
T02D2584:143a-35: lha yi rigs kyi rim pa dag /'di yi bsod nams ci 'dra las //
T02D2584:143a-37: 'di ni dngos grub gang grub pa //
T02D2584:143a-38: rigs ni gang gi snod gyur dang //
T02D2584:143a-39: bsod nams mthu ni gang yod pa //
T02D2584:143b-0: sangs @143b rgyas dngos grub thob bya'i phyir //
T02D2584:143b-1: bdag la thugs brtser dgongs nas ni //
T02D2584:143b-2: 'gro la phan pa'i gtso chen gyis //
T02D2584:143b-3: sman par dgongs te bzhes su gsol //
T02D2584:143b-4: h'um pra t'itstsha badzra ho zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis phreng ba dkyil 'khor du dor ro //
T02D2584:143b-5: de nas dngos grub rab 'bring me tog 'bab pa las brtag par bya ste /
T02D2584:143b-6: lha rnams kyi khyad par dang gnas kyi khyad par las brtags te /
T02D2584:143b-7: gang tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2584:143b-9: de tshe gtsug tor mdzod spu dag /'grub par 'gyur bas gdon mi za //
T02D2584:143b-10: spyan la sogs pa rnams kyang ni //
T02D2584:143b-11: zhal du babs par gyur pa na //
T02D2584:143b-12: stod du babs na mchog rnams grub //
T02D2584:143b-13: rked du babs na 'bring rnams grub //
T02D2584:143b-14: ro smad phyogs su babs na ni //
T02D2584:143b-16: bar gyi sku la babs na ni //
T02D2584:143b-17: snying pa la sogs grub par 'gyur //
T02D2584:143b-18: smad du babs par gyur na ni //
T02D2584:143b-19: mngag gzhug la sogs grub par 'gyur //
T02D2584:143b-20: rim pa de dag thams cad ni //
T02D2584:143b-21: rim bzhin rnam par shes par bya //
T02D2584:143b-22: de bzhin lha rnams gzhan la yang //
T02D2584:143b-23: dngos grub rnam pa gsum du bshad //
T02D2584:143b-24: gal te lha yi gzugs dag la //
T02D2584:143b-25: me tog ring du lhung gyur na //
T02D2584:143b-26: de yi dngos grub yun rings 'grub //
T02D2584:143b-27: nye na dngos grub myur du 'grub //
T02D2584:143b-28: gsangs sngags rnams kyi mchod pa dag / gang du bkram pa'i tshul can ni //
T02D2584:143b-29: de yi sa ris de yin te //
T02D2584:143b-30: me tog der lhung de yi rigs //
T02D2584:143b-31: lha gnyis kyi ni bar dag tu //
T02D2584:143b-32: gal te nges par babs gyur na //
T02D2584:143b-33: gang du nye ba de yi rigs //
T02D2584:143b-34: gal te la la'i me tog ni //
T02D2584:143b-36: de la dngos grub mi 'grub cing //
T02D2584:143b-37: bsod nams dad pa rab tu chung //
T02D2584:143b-38: gal te me tog dor ba dag / ra ba'i ri mo la bab na //
T02D2584:143b-39: zhi ba byas nas de dag gdod //
T02D2584:143b-40: nan tan bskyed de 'dor du gzhug / de ste the tshom gyur na ni //
T02D2584:143b-41: mkhas pas bzlas te 'dor mi gzhug / de ni gang yang nye med pas //
T02D2584:143b-42: des ni dngos grub thob mi 'gyur //
T02D2584:143b-43: gnyis kyi bar du mnyam pa na //
T02D2584:143b-44: don med phyi rol lhung na ni //
T02D2584:143b-45: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas nas su //
T02D2584:143b-46: de nas me tog dor du gzhug / snying por me tog babs pa ni //
T02D2584:144a-2: srad bu dag ni cho ga bzhin //
T02D2584:144a-3: de yi nye 'khor shes par bya //
T02D2584:144a-4: de la sogs pa'i rnam pa yis //
T02D2584:144a-5: me tog rnams ni dor ba las //
T02D2584:144a-6: bdag gi mdun du gang lhung ba //
T02D2584:144a-7: de la zhi ba brtsam par bya //
T02D2584:144a-8: sbyin sreg gis ni zhi byas na //
T02D2584:144a-9: de ni slar yang dor du gzhug / lan gsum spogs te 'dor na yang //
T02D2584:144a-10: gal te legs par ma bab na /
T02D2584:144a-11: re thag bcad de slar gtang bya //
T02D2584:144a-12: de nas me tog babs pa las //
T02D2584:144a-13: lha yang dag par shes byas nas //
T02D2584:144a-14: phreng ba blangs te sngags s'i brjod //
T02D2584:144a-15: aom pra ti gri hna rva mi mam stva ma
T02D2584:144a-16: h'a ba la zhes brjod la de'i mgo la bcing
T02D2584:144a-17: ngo // ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan ma nye bar mtshon nas //
T02D2584:144a-18: de la mig gis ji ltar mthong zhes dri'o //
T02D2584:144a-19: des ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2584:144a-20: gal te kha dog snang bar mthong na //
T02D2584:144a-21: de la dngos grub thams cad kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes rgya cher sbyar ro //
T02D2584:144a-22: de nas 'dis gdong g-yogs dgrol te //
T02D2584:144a-23: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02D2584:144a-24: mig gi ling tog bsal ba ltar //
T02D2584:144a-25: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
T02D2584:144a-26: rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02D2584:144a-27: badzra tsakshu he badzra p'a sha zhes brjod do //
T02D2584:144a-28: de nas gdong g-yogs dkrol nas ni //
T02D2584:144a-29: dkyil 'khor bzang po bstan par bya //
T02D2584:144a-30: de nas bla ma dga' 'gyur nas //
T02D2584:144a-31: slob ma de la 'di skad bsgo //
T02D2584:144a-33: da ni dang pa rab tu bskyed //
T02D2584:144a-34: khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02D2584:144a-35: sngags dang rigs pas byin gyis brlabs //
T02D2584:144a-36: 'gro ba phun sum dngos grub kyang //
T02D2584:144a-37: thams cad khyod la mngon du gyur //
T02D2584:144a-38: dngos grub thob phyir dam tshig skyongs //
T02D2584:144a-39: gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis //
T02D2584:144a-40: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na bshad par bya ste //
T02D2584:144a-41: mi mnyam med pas zur bzhir snyoms //
T02D2584:144a-42: dran dang dbang po sgo bzhi ste //
T02D2584:144a-43: bsam stan rta babs rnam pa bzhi //
T02D2584:144a-44: ting 'dzin khyams su shes par bya //
T02D2584:144a-45: khyams la brten pa rdo rje'i gdan //
T02D2584:144a-46: gzungs rnams lha mos mchod pa yi //
T02D2584:144a-47: rgyan rnams kun gyis bkra pa yang //
T02D2584:144a-48: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o //
T02D2584:144b-0: gdul bya @144b bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog / dar 'phan dril bu sgrogs pa yis //
T02D2584:144b-1: me long ye shes rtag mi rtog / byang chub yan lag me tog phreng //
T02D2584:144b-2: dra ba dra phyed rin chen mchog / nyi ma zla bar yang dag ldan //
T02D2584:144b-3: kun grub mi zad bde ba ste //
T02D2584:144b-4: bde ba chen po zhes grags so //
T02D2584:144b-5: de yi nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02D2584:144b-6: ka ba dkyil 'khor dra ba ni //
T02D2584:144b-7: dngos grub bde ba kun ster ba'i //
T02D2584:144b-8: rnam thar brgyad po de nyid yin //
T02D2584:144b-9: theg pa chen po byang chub sems //
T02D2584:144b-10: mdo sde'i 'khor lo bskor bas na //
T02D2584:144b-11: rdo rje thig gis yongs btab cing //
T02D2584:144b-12: thams cad du yang yongs su rdzogs //
T02D2584:144b-13: gang du 'jug pa de tsam gyis //
T02D2584:144b-14: mi tshugs pa dang mi log pa //
T02D2584:144b-15: bde ba chen po rab grub phyir //
T02D2584:144b-16: de dag dbang por yang dag 'gyur //
T02D2584:144b-17: de nas phyag rgya dang snying po yang bshad par bya ste //
T02D2584:144b-18: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te /
T02D2584:144b-19: mgon po 'jam dbyangs kyi bar du bstan par bya'o //
T02D2584:144b-20: de nas ma long bstan par bya ste /
T02D2584:144b-21: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D2584:144b-22: dag cing gsal la dri ma med //
T02D2584:144b-23: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02D2584:144b-24: rgyu dang las las kun du 'byung //
T02D2584:144b-25: ngo bo nyid med gnas med par //
T02D2584:144b-26: de ltar chos 'di shes nas su //
T02D2584:144b-27: sems can don ni mnyan par byos //
T02D2584:144b-28: 'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skyes //
T02D2584:144b-29: zhes sgyur ma lta bur stan to //
T02D2584:144b-30: de nas bla ma de la yon gyi mchog phul te /
T02D2584:144b-31: gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D2584:144b-32: 'di zhes bgyi ba rdo rje can //
T02D2584:144b-33: byang chub sems ni rnam bsgom pa //
T02D2584:144b-34: slob dpon zhabs kyi padma la //
T02D2584:144b-35: dang bskur phyir ni phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2584:144b-36: slob dpon rab tu rmad byung ba //
T02D2584:144b-37: rgyal ba rnams kyis dbang bskur nyid //
T02D2584:144b-38: sangs rgyas byang chub thob byed pa //
T02D2584:144b-39: skal pa che po bdag la stsol //
T02D2584:144b-41: de nas slob dpon gyis ho: zhes bya bas gzhu
T02D2584:144b-42: byin la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par
T02D2584:144b-44: phyogs bzhir mnga' bzhi 'phen du gzhug cing /
T02D2584:144b-45: steng dang 'og tu yang re re 'phen du gzhug go //
T02D2584:144b-46: de nas slob ma dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D2584:144b-47: shar phyogs kyi sgo'i mthar sna tshogs padma bris la gang yang rung ba'i skur bskyed de /
T02D2584:144b-48: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gnas par bsams la /
T02D2584:145a-0: @145a * // g-yas logs su dar dang me tog gi phreng bas
T02D2584:145a-1: brgyan pa'i gdugs dkar po la gtsug tor gdugs dkar
T02D2584:145a-3: g-yon du dar tshon sna tshogs pa bkram pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02D2584:145a-4: ba dan la aom yongs su bzlas pa legs par bzhag la //
T02D2584:145a-5: me tog la sogs pas mchod la sgra sna tshogs pas bsgrags so //
T02D2584:145a-6: bkra shis kyi glu len cing phyi nang gi gar sna tshogs pa yang bya'o //
T02D2584:145a-7: de nas rdo rje 'bebs ba'i bum pa la sogs
T02D2584:145a-8: pa tham cad gcig tu bsdoms te byin gyis brlabs
T02D2584:145a-9: la dbang bskur bar bya ste //
T02D2584:145a-10: che ba'i yon tan kun rdzogs shing //
T02D2584:145a-11: bdud rtsi'i chu yis rab bkang ba //
T02D2584:145a-12: rnam par dag pa'i bum pa 'dis //
T02D2584:145a-13: bu khyod la ni dbang bskur ro //
T02D2584:145a-14: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa zhes brjod do //
T02D2584:145a-15: slob ma rnams kyi spyi bor bzhag pas me long
T02D2584:145a-16: lta bu'i ye shes la mi bskyod pa ngo bor
T02D2584:145a-17: gyur ro // de nas de kho na nyid bstan te //
T02D2584:145a-18: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D2584:145a-19: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02D2584:145a-20: kun du bzang po thams cad bdag //
T02D2584:145a-21: rdo rje snyems tshul bag po'i bdag / ces bya ba //
T02D2584:145a-22: 'di ni 'jam dpal la bya bar bshad de ming thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2584:145a-24: srid pa'i rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:145a-25: ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas //
T02D2584:145a-26: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog / srid pa'i mchog ni byed par 'gyur //
T02D2584:145a-27: de nas dam tshig bsgrag par bya ste /
T02D2584:145a-28: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung //
T02D2584:145a-29: sdug bsngal chen po zhi bya'i phyir //
T02D2584:145a-30: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
T02D2584:145a-31: de bas dam tshig bsrung bar gyis //
T02D2584:145a-32: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni //
T02D2584:145a-33: ci 'dod par ni bsten bzhin du //
T02D2584:145a-34: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2584:145a-35: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
T02D2584:145a-36: ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni //
T02D2584:145a-37: mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe //
T02D2584:145a-38: de srid mtshungs med sems can don //
T02D2584:145a-39: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
T02D2584:145a-40: gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig thabs //
T02D2584:145a-41: bsod nams byin rlob sgrub byed pa //
T02D2584:145a-42: dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub //
T02D2584:145a-43: sems can don ni ston par byed //
T02D2584:145a-44: yid kyi gzugs ni brtan pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:145b-0: @145b phyag rgya dam tshig yin par grags //
T02D2584:145b-1: gang gi lus kun bstan pas na //
T02D2584:145b-2: des na phyag rgya yin par grags //
T02D2584:145b-4: de nas gsang ba bsgrags te /
T02D2584:145b-5: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi //
T02D2584:145b-6: khams gsum na ni sdig med de //
T02D2584:145b-7: de bas 'dod pa'i chags bral bar //
T02D2584:145b-8: khyed kyis nam yang ma byed cig / ces bya'o //
T02D2584:145b-10: mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02D2584:145b-11: theg pa che po rtog pa yi //
T02D2584:145b-12: tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzod //
T02D2584:145b-15: 'jig rten kun la thams cad du //
T02D2584:145b-16: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:145b-18: rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02D2584:145b-20: rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig / rdo
T02D2584:145b-21: rje rigs kyi bdag po rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil
T02D2584:145b-23: de nas dbu rgyan dang dar dbyangs su bcas pa byin gyis rlobs la //
T02D2584:145b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rgyan //
T02D2584:145b-25: sangs rgyas lnga yi ngo bo nyid //
T02D2584:145b-26: rin po che yi dbu rgyan dang //
T02D2584:145b-27: dar dbyangs dag gis dbang bskur ro //
T02D2584:145b-28: aom ratna aa bhi shi nytsa zhes brjod pas //
T02D2584:145b-29: mnyam pa nyid kye shes las //
T02D2584:145b-30: rdo rje rin po cher gyur to //
T02D2584:145b-31: de nas de kho na nyid bstan //
T02D2584:145b-32: ni ma 'di ni mchog yin te /
T02D2584:145b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong //
T02D2584:145b-34: nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2584:145b-35: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa'o //
T02D2584:145b-37: de nas chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan te /
T02D2584:145b-38: bsam pa thams cad rab grub pas //
T02D2584:145b-40: de yang 'dod par rab grub phyir //
T02D2584:145b-41: 'dod dang thar pa'i bde chen po //
T02D2584:145b-43: de nas dam tshig bsgrags te /
T02D2584:145b-44: sems can kun la phan phyir dang //
T02D2584:145b-45: sangs rgyas don du sbyor ba yis //
T02D2584:145b-46: pha rol nor rnams phrogs kyang ni //
T02D2584:145b-47: sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2584:145b-49: de nas gsangs ba bsgrags te /
T02D2584:145b-50: dod dang bde ba thams cad dang //
T02D2584:145b-51: mi mthun pa yang sbyin bya zhing //
T02D2584:145b-52: bdag nyid kyang ni pha rol gyi //
T02D2584:145b-53: bsam pa thams cad rdzog par gyis //
T02D2584:145b-55: rin chen khyed la gsol ba ni //
T02D2584:145b-56: nor gyi tshogs ni bshad du gsol //
T02D2584:145b-57: rang gi rigs ni bskyed par mdzod //
T02D2584:146a-2: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:146a-4: nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02D2584:146a-6: rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig / rin
T02D2584:146a-7: po che'i rigs kyi bdag po rin po che'i rigs
T02D2584:146a-8: kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do ;
T02D2584:146a-9: / de nas rdo rje byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2584:146a-10: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje dbang //
T02D2584:146a-11: de ring khyod la dbang bskur bya //
T02D2584:146a-12: sangs rgyas kun du rab grub phyir //
T02D2584:146a-13: bu khyod la ni bskur bar bya //
T02D2584:146a-14: badzra aa dhi pa ti aa bhi shinytsa zhes brjod pas /
T02D2584:146a-15: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes las rdo rje chos kyi sems dpar gyur to //
T02D2584:146a-16: de nas de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste /
T02D2584:146a-18: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ste //
T02D2584:146a-19: 'dul ba thabs kyis mdzad pa ni //
T02D2584:146a-20: dag pa'i rol mor rab tu 'jug / ces brjod do //
T02D2584:146a-21: de nas chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan te /
T02D2584:146a-23: tshon gyi nyes pas ma gos ltar //
T02D2584:146a-24: de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa 'dis //
T02D2584:146a-25: 'gro phan rnams la mi gos so //
T02D2584:146a-27: de nas dam tshig bstan te /
T02D2584:146a-28: cho ga 'di dag gang gang gis //
T02D2584:146a-30: padma dag par sbyor ba'i bdag //
T02D2584:146a-31: de dag der ni sbyor bar bya //
T02D2584:146a-33: de nas gsang ba bsgrags te /
T02D2584:146a-35: rgyal ba rnams la de phul la //
T02D2584:146a-36: sems can don du sbyin med mchog / bsten na bsod nams thob par 'gyur //
T02D2584:146a-39: dpa' bo khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02D2584:146a-40: rang gi rigs rnams bskyed nas ni //
T02D2584:146a-42: thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol //
T02D2584:146a-45: 'jig rten kun la thams cad du //
T02D2584:146a-46: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:146a-50: rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig / padma
T02D2584:146a-51: rigs kyi bdag po chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig
T02D2584:146a-52: ces brjod do // de nas dril bu byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2584:146a-53: 'di ni shes rab nyid kyi dngos //
T02D2584:146a-54: shes rab da byings kyi rjes 'gro ba'i //
T02D2584:146a-55: de ring khyod la 'dir dbang bskur //
T02D2584:146a-56: aom pra dzny'a p'a ra mi t'a dharma aa zhes brjod /
T02D2584:146b-0: bya ba grub @146b pa'i ye shes las sna tshogs
T02D2584:146b-1: rdo rje can du gyur par bsams la de kho
T02D2584:146b-4: rdo rje me yi phung po'i gzugs //
T02D2584:146b-5: 'bar ba'i rdo rje sbyor ba che //
T02D2584:146b-8: de nas chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan te /
T02D2584:146b-9: chos rnams nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D2584:146b-10: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
T02D2584:146b-11: nam mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2584:146b-14: de nas dam tshig bstan te //
T02D2584:146b-15: thams cad nam mkha' sbyor ba yis //
T02D2584:146b-16: thams cad nam mkha' zhes smra zhing //
T02D2584:146b-17: rdo rje'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab la //
T02D2584:146b-18: khams gsum yang ni bza' bar bya //
T02D2584:146b-20: de nas gsang ba bsgrags te /
T02D2584:146b-21: sems can kun la phan phyir dang //
T02D2584:146b-22: sangs rgyas bstan pa'i don du ni /
T02D2584:146b-23: sems can thams cad gsad na yang //
T02D2584:146b-24: de ni sdig pas gos mi 'gyur //
T02D2584:146b-26: mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02D2584:146b-27: sangs rgyas kun la dbang byed cing //
T02D2584:146b-28: sems can kun don bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2584:146b-29: rang gi rigs ni bskyed par mdzod /
T02D2584:146b-32: mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du //
T02D2584:146b-33: sems can kun kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:146b-35: las kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02D2584:146b-37: rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig / las
T02D2584:146b-38: kyi rigs kyi bdag po chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
T02D2584:146b-40: de nas byin gyis brlabs pa'i lag pa de rnams spyi bor bzhag la //
T02D2584:146b-41: khyod ni sangs rgyas dngos yin te //
T02D2584:146b-42: rab tu gsang ba gsang ba'i ming//
T02D2584:146b-43: rdo rje che ge mo zhes pa //
T02D2584:146b-44: de ring khyod la dbang bskur ro //
T02D2584:146b-45: aom badzra n'a ma aa bhi shinytsa zhes pa la
T02D2584:146b-46: sogs pa brjod pas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes
T02D2584:146b-47: las rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bor gyur to
T02D2584:146b-48: // de la de kho na nyid bstan te //
T02D2584:146b-49: de nyid du ni bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2584:146b-50: de bzhin gshegs dang byang chub sems //
T02D2584:146b-51: lta ngan rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:146b-53: sna tshogs 'dul bar brtson pa yi //
T02D2584:146b-54: brtan zhing nges pa'i chos nyid can //
T02D2584:146b-55: srid pa shin tu gnas mchog tu //
T02D2584:146b-56: go cha la sogs nges par gon //
T02D2584:146b-57: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs la sogs //
T02D2584:146b-58: dkon mchog gsum po nyid du rtogs //
T02D2584:147a-0: @147a * // srid pa shin tu legs par bsgrub //
T02D2584:147a-1: sna tshogs mkhyen pa dpal byed mchog / ces brjod do //
T02D2584:147a-2: de nas chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan te /
T02D2584:147a-3: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D2584:147a-4: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
T02D2584:147a-5: nam mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor bas //
T02D2584:147a-6: kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal //
T02D2584:147a-8: de nas dam tshig bstan par bya ste /
T02D2584:147a-9: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la //
T02D2584:147a-10: ci bde bar ni bsten bzhin du //
T02D2584:147a-11: dkon mchog gsum yang mchod par bgyi //
T02D2584:147a-12: rang nyid dang ni brten par bya'o //
T02D2584:147a-14: de nas gsang ba bsgrags te /
T02D2584:147a-15: ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams //
T02D2584:147a-17: chags la sogs pa yun rings su //
T02D2584:147a-18: de bzhin 'gro ba'i don rnams kyis //
T02D2584:147a-21: mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02D2584:147a-22: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:147a-23: thugs rje chen po bskyed nas kyang //
T02D2584:147a-24: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02D2584:147a-27: 'jig rten kun la thams cad du //
T02D2584:147a-28: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2584:147a-30: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02D2584:147a-32: rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig / de
T02D2584:147a-33: bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
T02D2584:147a-34: cig ces brjod de tha ma de rnams ni rjes
T02D2584:147a-36: de nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2584:147a-37: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2584:147a-38: phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug / khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D2584:147a-39: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02D2584:147a-40: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma
T02D2584:147a-41: ya ti shtha ae sha stam dha ra ya mi
T02D2584:147a-42: / badzra sa tva hi hi hi hi h'um zhes brjod do //
T02D2584:147a-43: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2584:147a-44: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro ba //
T02D2584:147a-45: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D2584:147a-46: byang chub rdo rje rgyal bas gsungs //
T02D2584:147a-49: de nas chos kyi 'khor lo rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du bzhag la /
T02D2584:147a-50: dung lag pa g-yas par sbyin te 'di skad brjod do //
T02D2584:147a-51: deng nas brtsams te dbang bskur ba tsam gyis chos
T02D2584:147a-52: kyi 'khor lo bskor cig / chos kyi dung bus
T02D2584:147a-53: shig /'jig rten kun la zab mo'i chos kyi sgra
T02D2584:147a-54: sgrogs shig / de nas gzengs bstod de /
T02D2584:147b-0: 'di ltar snang ba'i @147b dngos po kun //
T02D2584:147b-1: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid de //
T02D2584:147b-2: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi dbang bskur bas //
T02D2584:147b-3: de bzhin gshegs par khyod gyur to //
T02D2584:147b-5: nga yis 'di ltar khyod lung bstan //
T02D2584:147b-6: 'jam dpal gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2584:147b-7: khyod ni sangs rgyas dngos yin gyis //
T02D2584:147b-8: som nyi yid gnyis ma za cig / de nas dbugs dbyung bar bya ste /
T02D2584:147b-10: mthong ba'am ni zhugs pa yis //
T02D2584:147b-11: sdig pa kun las rnam grol ba //
T02D2584:147b-12: khyod ni deng nyid gnas yin te //
T02D2584:147b-13: bde chen theg pa 'di la ni //
T02D2584:147b-14: slar khyod 'chi ba yod min te //
T02D2584:147b-15: cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis //
T02D2584:147b-16: khyod ni mchog tu gyur pa'i //
T02D2584:147b-18: de nas phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi mchod pas mchod de bkra shis brjod do //
T02D2584:147b-19: slob ma'i tshogs rnams dang sgra'i rnam pa mang pos
T02D2584:147b-20: sna drangs la dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor ba bya'o
T02D2584:147b-21: // de nas slob ma'i spyi bo nas gdugs dang
T02D2584:147b-22: rgyal mtshan la sogs pa rnams dkyil 'khor la phul
T02D2584:147b-24: da ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyur //
T02D2584:147b-26: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D2584:147b-27: lha rnams kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur //
T02D2584:147b-28: sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir //
T02D2584:147b-29: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin //
T02D2584:147b-30: nan tan bskyed de bri bar gyis //
T02D2584:147b-31: sgrub pa po rnams rgyud la sbyor //
T02D2584:147b-32: khyod kyis chos la ser sna dang //
T02D2584:147b-33: sems can kun la mi phan pa //
T02D2584:147b-34: nyam nga chen por gyur kyang ni //
T02D2584:147b-35: bu khyod kyis ni mi bya'o //
T02D2584:147b-36: de nas slob ma re re'i lag pa g-yon pas
T02D2584:147b-37: g-yas pa'i mthe chung nas bzung nas zhi ba'i phyir
T02D2584:147b-39: de nas dkyil 'khor la mchod pa dang bstod pa
T02D2584:147b-40: dang bzod par gsol ba bya ste ye shes kyi
T02D2584:147b-42: bskyed pa'i mtshan tsho bdag gi thugs kar bsdus la //
T02D2584:147b-43: rdul tshon phyags te chu po chen por dor bar bya'o //
T02D2584:147b-44: de nas gnas de yang dri sna tshogs kyi chus legs par byug par bya'o //
T02D2584:147b-45: de nas slob ma dam pa des /
T02D2584:147b-46: ci bzhed yon rnams phul nas su //
T02D2584:147b-47: gsang dbang nod phyir 'di skad zhu //
T02D2584:147b-48: bla ma dam pa bde gshegs gtso //
T02D2584:147b-49: khro bo 'khor dang bcas pa la //
T02D2584:148a-0: @148a * // lus ngag yid kyis bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D2584:148a-1: gsang gsum dam pa'i dbang mchog 'di //
T02D2584:148a-2: di ring bdag la gnang bar stsol //
T02D2584:148a-4: de nas bla ma dam pa des //
T02D2584:148a-5: gsang ba'i dbang bskur brtsam bya ste //
T02D2584:148a-6: shin tu dben pa'i gnas rnams su //
T02D2584:148a-7: mandala dri zhim bdud rtsis byugs //
T02D2584:148a-8: me tog bkram ste stan bzangs bting //
T02D2584:148a-9: de rjes slob mas shes rab ma //
T02D2584:148a-10: mchog dang rab dang 'bring dang mtha' //
T02D2584:148a-11: bla ma la phul 'di skad brjod //
T02D2584:148a-12: khyod ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni //
T02D2584:148a-13: bde gshegs rnams kyis bde ba mdzad //
T02D2584:148a-14: byang chub sems dpa' che rnams kyis //
T02D2584:148a-15: yang dag don mchog rnam dag pa //
T02D2584:148a-16: ji ltar ji bzhin bdud rtsi yis //
T02D2584:148a-17: mchog gi dbang ni bskur ba bzhin //
T02D2584:148a-18: de bzhin bdag la 'khor ba yi //
T02D2584:148a-19: sdug bsngal rnams ni sel bar mdzod //
T02D2584:148a-20: rnal 'byor bdud rtsi dri med mchog / ma rig nges par rab rib rnams //
T02D2584:148a-21: gang zhig byang chub bla med pa //
T02D2584:148a-22: de ring bdag gis thob par mdzod //
T02D2584:148a-24: de nas bla mas shes rab ma //
T02D2584:148a-25: mdangs ldan ma ni rab bskyed la //
T02D2584:148a-26: cho ga thams cad rdzogs par bya //
T02D2584:148a-27: thabs dang shes rab byin rlobs la //
T02D2584:148a-29: dgug gzhug bcing dang bstim par bya //
T02D2584:148a-30: chags pa bskyed phyir sngags 'di brjod //
T02D2584:148a-31: aom manydzu shr'i sarba ta th'a ga t'a nu r'a
T02D2584:148a-32: ga badzra sva bh'a wa a'a tma ko& ham zhes
T02D2584:148a-33: brjod de / bsrub pa dang bsrubs pa'i sbyor ba
T02D2584:148a-34: mdzad pas bde bar gshegs pa 'od du zhu ste
T02D2584:148a-35: brjod de / / byang chub kyi sems su phab
T02D2584:148a-36: pas nor bu'i nang du bde ba rnyed pa thabs
T02D2584:148a-37: dang shes rab kyi sgo bkag ste /
T02D2584:148a-38: slob ma'i kha ru dbab par bya'o //
T02D2584:148a-40: byang chub sems kyi rdo rje 'di //
T02D2584:148a-41: sems kyi sdug bsngal rnam bcom ste //
T02D2584:148a-42: gsang ba'i gnas dang dam par bcas //
T02D2584:148a-43: de ring khyod la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2584:148a-44: zhes brjod de slob ma'i kha ru'o //
T02D2584:148a-45: slob ma des kyang tshul rnam pa bzhis bdud rtsi sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D2584:148a-46: des ni ngag gnyis pa dang rnam par rtog pa dag par byed pas gsung gi dbang zhes bya'o //
T02D2584:148a-47: de la lung bstan par bya ste /
T02D2584:148a-48: bla mas chos gos gyon la lag pa g-yon pas chos gos kyi mtha' ma chag par bcug ste /
T02D2584:148a-49: g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya bcas te /
T02D2584:148b-0: @148b dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams gsal bar byas la /
T02D2584:148b-1: sngon 'jam pa'i rdo rjes lung bstan pa bzhin du
T02D2584:148b-2: mgrin gcig tu lung ston par bsams la 'di skad
T02D2584:148b-3: brjod do // 'di ltar nga yis lung bstan te //
T02D2584:148b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2584:148b-5: dngos grub mchog tu bsgrub pa'i phyir//
T02D2584:148b-6: srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton //
T02D2584:148b-7: manydzu shr'i na ma: sarba ta th'a ga ta hri si ddhi sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod de /
T02D2584:148b-8: dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams kyis lung ston par mdzad do //
T02D2584:148b-9: de nas dbugs dbyung ba ni khams gsum gyi bdag por gyur pa dang /
T02D2584:148b-10: bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa las rgyal ba dang /
T02D2584:148b-11: mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa ste /
T02D2584:148b-12: 'di nyid las thob par gyur cig / the tshom
T02D2584:148b-13: dang yid gnyis la sogs pa ma byed cig /
T02D2584:148b-14: gzhan yang bla ma dam pas dbang bskur ba tsam
T02D2584:148b-15: gyis ji ltar bsams pa ltar slob ma rnams kyis
T02D2584:148b-16: grub par gyur ro zhes brjod do //
T02D2584:148b-17: de ni slob ma gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba ste /
T02D2584:148b-18: dbang rnams rdzogs pas rim par sbyin //
T02D2584:148b-19: gsang ba'i dbang dang zhes gsungs pa la de skad ces bshad do //
T02D2584:148b-20: de nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2584:148b-21: nges pa'i dbang rim pa bzhin du bskur bar bya zhes gsungs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02D2584:148b-22: de ltar gsang ba'i dbang thob pa'i slob ma des kyang bla ma la 'di skad zhu ste /
T02D2584:148b-23: sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02D2584:148b-24: ji ltar mkhyen cing thugs chud pa //
T02D2584:148b-25: de ltar rjes su bdag dad na //
T02D2584:148b-26: de ring bdag la dbang bskur stsol //
T02D2584:148b-28: de nas bla ma des shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba brtsam ste /
T02D2584:148b-29: de yang dang la shes rab kyi dbang ni bu mo rigs ldan mtshan rtags can /
T02D2584:148b-30: bcu gnyis bcu drug bco brgyad nyi shu lon pa
T02D2584:148b-31: bla ma la phul la bsam gtan gyi don drug
T02D2584:148b-33: bla ma des shes rab ma byin gyis brlabs te 'di skad ces bsgo'o //
T02D2584:148b-34: sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis kyang //
T02D2584:148b-36: rigs kyi bu mchog khyod kyis kyang //
T02D2584:148b-37: shes rab spang du mi rung ste //
T02D2584:148b-38: ye shes skye ba'i thabs yin pas //
T02D2584:148b-39: khyod kyis 'dod chags ma spang zhig / ces brjod do //
T02D2584:148b-40: de nas bla mas dri ba 'di yang gsung ngo //
T02D2584:149a-2: dri chen dri chu za nus sam //
T02D2584:149a-3: rakta ga pur tha nus sam //
T02D2584:149a-4: bud med dad pas bsten nus sam //
T02D2584:149a-6: snod ldan smros shig ngang tshul can //
T02D2584:149a-7: de nas slob mas 'di skad brjod //
T02D2584:149a-8: shes rab dad pas bdag bsten to //
T02D2584:149a-9: dri chen dri chu la sogs bdud rtsi lnga //
T02D2584:149a-10: rtag tu dad pas ston par bgyid //
T02D2584:149a-12: de nas bla ma dam pa des //
T02D2584:149a-13: shes rab ma gcer bur phyung la //
T02D2584:149a-14: lus dri zhim po'i chus bkrus la /
T02D2584:149a-15: me tog gi phreng bas mgo bcings la 'di skad ces bsgo'o //
T02D2584:149a-16: ston pa'i rang bzhin snying rje'i bdag / khyod kyis sems can don rnams gyis //
T02D2584:149a-17: mkha' klong padma bsten par gyis //
T02D2584:149a-18: bu 'di bde ba bskyed par gyis //
T02D2584:149a-20: de nas shes rab dam pa des lag pa gnyis
T02D2584:149a-21: dril bu bzung nas padma kha phye ste 'di skad
