T02D2584:149a-22: brjod do // rmad byung nga yi padma la //
T02D2584:149a-23: bde ba thams cad 'di la rnyed //
T02D2584:149a-24: bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kun //
T02D2584:149a-27: sangs rgyas thams cad 'di las byung //
T02D2584:149a-28: sems can thams cad 'di ru grol //
T02D2584:149a-29: nang gi rtsa yi 'khor lo la //
T02D2584:149a-30: padma zhes su rab tu gsungs //
T02D2584:149a-31: padma'i nang gi nam mkha' la /
T02D2584:149a-33: // 'byung ba lnga po rang bzhin gnas //
T02D2584:149a-34: lte ba la ni ge sar te //
T02D2584:149a-35: padma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D2584:149a-37: de nyid bdud rtsi dam pa ste //
T02D2584:149a-38: sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po'o //
T02D2584:149a-40: de nas bla mas slob ma'i lag pa g-yas pa dang /
T02D2584:149a-41: shes rab ma'i g-yon pa 'og tu bzhag nas 'di skad brjod do //
T02D2584:149a-42: shes rab dam pa 'di yin te //
T02D2584:149a-43: khyed kyi ye shes skyed par byed //
T02D2584:149a-44: 'di dang khyed nyid ma bral bar //
T02D2584:149a-45: dad pas rtag tu rol mo gyis //
T02D2584:149a-47: shes rab ma'i lus la dkyil 'khor bkod la slob ma la sbyin no //
T02D2584:149a-48: slob ma yol ba nang du shes rab ma dang 'dug nas ye shes kyi dbang nod par bya'o //
T02D2584:149a-49: de nas shes rab ma dang slob mas glo g-yas pa phab la nyal lo //
T02D2584:149a-50: dga' ba'i gtam sna tshogs bya'o //
T02D2584:149a-51: gnas dgu ru ni sen mo gdab //
T02D2584:149a-52: g-yon pa glang po'i sna rtse yis //
T02D2584:149b-1: ; tshod zin bya ste brud par bya //
T02D2584:149b-2: lce yis kyang ni rol mo bya'o //
T02D2584:149b-4: gzod nyi ma dang zla ba mnyam par bya ste /
T02D2584:149b-5: dal nas dal nas bskyod pa las //
T02D2584:149b-6: 'byung ba bzhi'i rkyen gyis bde ba chen po'i dbus
T02D2584:149b-7: na byang chub sems gnas pa la ye shes kyi
T02D2584:149b-8: mes bzhu nas 'khor lo bzhi nas rim par 'bab
T02D2584:149b-9: ste / bolla'i rtsa bar phyin pa ni dga' ba'o //
T02D2584:149b-10: dbus su phyin pa ni mchog dga'o //
T02D2584:149b-11: nor bu'i rtse mor sleb pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D2584:149b-12: de ji tsam gnas kyi bar du bsgoms pas mi rtog pa'i ye shes skye ste /
T02D2584:149b-13: dper na rus sbal lta bu'o //
T02D2584:149b-14: gal te bsdams pas ma thems na 'jig rten pa'i
T02D2584:149b-15: gnas su gshegs te bral ba'i dga' ba zhes bya'o
T02D2584:149b-16: // don dang bral ba ni bral ba'o //
T02D2584:149b-17: gong ma mtshon pas dga' ba'o //
T02D2584:149b-18: byang sems de yi rang bzhin ni //
T02D2584:149b-19: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi rang bzhin pas //
T02D2584:149b-20: dung dang nya phyis dag gis min //
T02D2584:149b-21: lag pas kyang ni mi blang ngo //
T02D2584:149b-22: bdud rtsi lce yis blang bar bya'o //
T02D2584:149b-23: de zos ye shes dbab mchog thob //
T02D2584:149b-24: de yi don la rgyun goms pas //
T02D2584:149b-25: 'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun //
T02D2584:149b-26: skad cig gcig la gnyis med pa'o //
T02D2584:149b-27: brjod pa'i tha snyad kun dang bral //
T02D2584:149b-28: nam mkha'i lam la rab gnas pa'i //
T02D2584:149b-29: ye shes snang ba lam me ba //
T02D2584:149b-30: mthar phyin gdams ngag ces kyang bya //
T02D2584:149b-31: de nas dam par gyur pa de la ni //
T02D2584:149b-32: rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhir bsgrag par bya'o //
T02D2584:149b-33: de nas bkra shis gdon pa'i don ni 'jam dpal
T02D2584:149b-34: gyi sku gzugs spyi bo'i thog tu bzhag la 'di
T02D2584:149b-36: thabs dang shes rab yan lag 'dus pa'i rdo rje las byung ba'i //
T02D2584:149b-37: byang chub sems kyi 'jam dbyangs byang chub sems dbang bskur //
T02D2584:149b-38: rgyal mchog sras bcas rnams kyis legs gsungs bkra shis gang //
T02D2584:149b-39: des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog //
T02D2584:149b-40: dpal ldan rdo rje sems sogs dkyil 'khor la 'jug cing //
T02D2584:149b-41: srid pa'i snying por rnam rol sgeg mo la sogs pas //
T02D2584:149b-42: bde byed rab mchog legs par glur blangs bkra shis gang //
T02D2584:149b-43: des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis
T02D2584:149b-44: shog / shin tu zhi ba'i mdzad pa phul phyung
T02D2584:150a-0: ma lus pas // sems can bde gshegs rtag mdzad @150a * //
T02D2584:150a-2: dpag med lha yi mchog gis legs gsungs bkra shis gang //
T02D2584:150a-3: des ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis
T02D2584:150a-4: shog / dpal ldan khams gsum rnam rgyal dkyil 'khor
T02D2584:150a-5: rab mchog la // 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal mchog rgyal por dbang bskur bas //
T02D2584:150a-6: lha yi mchog gis btud de rab bshad bkra shis gang //
T02D2584:150a-7: des ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis
T02D2584:150a-8: shog /'gro ba sna tshogs 'dul phyir phyag na padmo
T02D2584:150a-9: yis // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rin chen bdud rtsi'i chus dbang bskur //
T02D2584:150a-10: padma'i 'dod chags rnam dag legs gsungs bkra shis gang //
T02D2584:150a-11: des ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis
T02D2584:150a-12: shog / mkha' snying nor bu rin chen 'byor bas
T02D2584:150a-13: nyams dga' zhing // don rnam kun grub bde sbyin dbang bskur chen po la //
T02D2584:150a-14: dge ba phun tshogs mdzad pas legs gsungs bkra shis gang//
T02D2584:150a-15: des ni khyed la dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis
T02D2584:150a-16: shog /'khor los sgyur drug dge ba'i bkra shis glu
T02D2584:150a-17: blangs pas // bsod nams rin chen dri med mi mnyam gang thob pa //
T02D2584:150a-18: des na kun gson 'byor ba'i dbang bskur chen po la //
T02D2584:150a-20: rnam par legs gyur cig / ces brjod do //
T02D2584:150a-21: de nas spyod lam bya ba dang /
T02D2584:150a-22: bla mas gzengs bstod pa dang /
T02D2584:150a-23: bkra shis kyis gshegs su gsol bar bya ba dang /
T02D2584:150a-24: bla ma la yon dbul ba rnams ni dkyus nyid gsal lo //
T02D2584:150a-25: bla ma dam pa s'u rya siddha sh'a ntim garbha ni /
T02D2584:150a-26: dam pa chos kyi mdzod du gyur pa la //
T02D2584:150a-27: bde bar gshegs pa'i tshogs kyi spyan snga ru //
T02D2584:150a-28: don dam zab mo dbang bskur zhal gyi bdud rtsi 'thungs pa yis //
T02D2584:150a-29: blo gros bzang po dran pa'i ye shes kyis //
T02D2584:150a-30: skye bo blo ngan mun pa bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D2584:150a-31: drug stong la sogs rgyud kyi don bsdus nas //
T02D2584:150a-32: nor bu gling ba'i sgrub thabs don dang sbyar te bris pa yis //
T02D2584:150a-33: bdag gis bsod nams rgyas pa thob bsdus pas //
T02D2584:150a-34: gang des 'gro kun sdig las rgyal gyur zhing //
T02D2584:150a-35: 'jam dpal chos kyi sku nyid thob par shog /'phags
T02D2584:150a-36: pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i
T02D2584:150b-0: sgrub thabs gsang ba dang ldan pa'i @150b 'grel pa
T02D2584:150b-1: ye shes gsal ba zhes bya ba /
